description.zh: 本課程在使學生認識即時電腦控制系統，瞭解其系統架構，並學習即時電腦控制系統之軟體設計技術。內容包含： (1)即時控制系統介紹， (2)電腦控制， (3)即時控制系統之硬體需求， (4)電腦控制實現， (5)作業系統， (6)即時控制系統設計， (7)即時控制系統性能分析。
description.en: This course let students to understand the real-time computer control system and learn the skill to design the software of real-time computer control system.  The contents of this course are: (1)Real-time Computer Control System Introduction, (2)Concept of Computer Control, (3)Computer Hardware Requirement for Real-time Computer Control System, (4) Computer Control Implementation, (5)Operating Systems (6)Real-time Computer Control System Design, (7)Real-time Computer Control System Performance Analysis.

name.zh: RFID射頻辨識系統設計原理與應用
name.en: The Design Theory and Application of RFID

description.zh: 射頻辨識系統(Radio Frequency Identificatoin ; RFID )已被列為21世紀所發展的重要科技產業技術項目之一。可取代目前的條碼(Bar-code)資訊辨識系統，整合應用在門禁管理、保全管制、運輸監控、航空行李管控、圖書管理、物流管理及醫療管理等不同的相關領域上。因此本課程在使學生暸解RFID的基本設計原理及整合應用，並培養其實際設計的能力，進而能將之應用於不同的資訊領域上。
description.en: The RFID is one of the important technique industry item of that develop for 21 centuries. RFID can replacement for the current recognizes system of the bar code. It can integrate to apply in management of the control at gate, security control and conveyance supervising and control, control of the baggage of the aviation, management of the books, logistics and management of the medical treatment etc. This course is making student understand the basic design theory and integration applies at first, and training the ability of the design, then can apply RFID on different field of the information.

description.zh: 軟性計算最佳化與傳統計算(硬性計算)最佳化的最主要差別在於軟性計算可以容忍對問題的不確定性，不精確性，部分正確性以及類似性。實際上，軟性計算的主要模型係依據人類思維的模式或是生物系統的運作而發展出來的。軟性計算的主要導引基礎為:利用不確定性，不精確性，部分正確性以及類似性，以獲得可追蹤，強健以及快速的解。軟性計算主要源於1965年由Zadeh所提出的模糊集理論，1973年提出的複雜系統分析與決策支援，1979年提出的軟性資料分析與機率理論。在更後期也陸續提出類神經計算與基因演算。本課程主要針對基因演算法(GA)與演進歸化法(EP/ES)進行討論，其他的方法如粒子群集(PSO)，模擬退火法(SA)也在本課程介紹之列。
description.en: The differences between Soft computing and conventional (hard) computing in that it can tolerant imprecision, uncertainty, partial truth, and approximation. The key model for soft computing is the human mind or biological systems.  The guiding principle of soft computing includes: Exploit the tolerance for imprecision, uncertainty, partial truth, and approximation to achieve tractability, robustness and low solution cost. The basic ideas underlying soft computing in its current incarnation have links to many earlier influences, among them Zadeh's 1965 paper on fuzzy sets; the 1973 paper on the analysis of complex systems and decision processes; and the 1979 report (1981 paper) on possibility theory and soft data analysis. The inclusion of neural computing and genetic computing in soft computing came at a later point. The main focus of this course will be in Genetic Algorithm (GA) and Evolutionary Programming/Evolutionary Strategy (EP/ES).  Other methods such as Particle Swarm Optimizat

name.en: Special Topics on T-S Fuzzy Model

description.zh: 本課程主要是介紹T-S fuzzy model的理論及其原理，首先介紹如何將一非線性系統藉由Fuzzy Modeling的方法，將其轉換成T-S Fuzzy Model，再以一有系統的方法設計控制器，並將穩定條件以LMI形式表示，最後利用所推導出的演算法，針對真實物理系統進行驗證。
description.en: In this course, the theory and principle of T-S fuzzy model are introduced. First, a procedure how to transform a nonlinear system to a T-S fuzzy model is introduced. Secondly, some systematic methods are introduced to design the controllers for the stability of the overall system and the stability condition is formulated by LMIs form. Finally, the design procedure is utilized to demonstrate by a real physical system.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹最佳控制之相關原理與應用，內容包括如下：最佳控制簡介，性能指標，動態規劃法，變分法, 變分法在最佳控制之應用，最佳控制之數值解與個案研究等。

The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction of optimal control, performance measure, dynamic programming, calculus of variations, variational approach to optimal control problems, numerical solution of optimal control, and case studies.

name.en: The obtainment and application of the property of high-tech patent

description.zh: 「高科技專利之財產取得與應用」內容包括：專利的意涵與其重要法規, 專利實體審查基準, 專利審查實例閱讀與分析, 專利侵權鑑定, 專利舉發實例閱讀與分析, 專利侵害及訴訟實例分析, 專利行政救濟, 簡易專利地圖製作, 專利分析與其戰略佈局, 專利迴避應用與技術創新, 技術產權管理相關理論的熟悉與運用。
description.en: The contents of "the obtainment and application of the property of high-tech patent" comprises: the meaning of the patent and important rules of patent, patent substantive examination procedures, reading and analyzing about patent substantive examination cases, patent infringement verification, reading and analyzing cases for patent invalidation action, analyzing cases for patent infringement and litigation, patent administrative remedy, fabrication of simple patent map, patent analysis and strategy, application of patent around and technical innovation, and familiarity and exercise of related theories of technique property.

description.zh: 超快雷射由於其脈衝寬度在皮秒(10-12)之下，它在軍事科技、工業應用、生醫檢測與學術研究所扮演的角色日益重要，本課程將介紹超短脈衝雷射的種類與其短脈衝產生的原理、脈衝壓縮的技術與超短脈衝量測的技術，此外也將介紹超快雷射的應用包括光譜量測、泵-探量測與非線性光學量測等技術。
description.en: Due to short pulse generation below one picosecond, ultrafast laser has been widely used in military, industry, biomedical diagnosis and scientific research.  In this course, it will introduce various kind of the ultrafast laser、principle of mode-locked pulse generation、pulse compression technique and the method of ultrashort pulse measurement.  Various application of ultrafast laser including fluorescence measurement, pump-probe measurement and nonlinear optics measurement has also been included in this course.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 利用基因工程，生物化學、微生物學之原理，培養變種之微生物（或改良過的微生物），動、植物細胞，以製造生物活性物質（如抗生素、免疫體、酵素、毒素、激素、特殊結構之蛋白、脂肪、醣類、脂肪酸、氨基酸、生長因子、藥理活性成份、抗體等等）；結合生物技術與化工原理來進行微生物、動、植物細胞之培養、酵素之提取、反應動力學、生物反應器的操作與相關參考數之獲取法、產品之分離程序等。
description.en: By the application of genetic engineering, biochemistry and microorganisms or animal or plant cells and how to produce living organisms. In combination of biotechnology and chemical engineering to learn cell incubation, enzyme purification, bioreactor operation, and product separation, etc.

description.zh: 本課程主要在使學生懂得基本的微生物學外，更將引導學生練習閱讀一些國外期刊的最新研究，內容包括：微生物分子遺傳、微生物免疫、微生物生理及微生物與藥物等知識。
description.en: This course will let students to learn basic microbiology; furthermore, will introduce students to learn how to read SCI journals and new knowledge in microbiology. It contains molecular genetics of microorganisms, immunology of microorganisms, physiology of microorganisms and the relationships between microorganisms and drugs.

description.zh: 課程上設計了兩大部分　　一為生物技術產業概論-基礎；另一為生物技術產業概論-進階。　　基礎部分以分析化學為切入點，再進入蛋白質與酵素之生化領域，再擴展到各種大小分子的整合應用，最後引進細胞與組織工程的建構；接下來再以各重要特化領域，進行分項介紹，包含特用化學品、食品科學、醫療藥品與植物科學，期待學員們能確時掌握各項領域之技術與應用。　　進階部分以最具發展潛力之生物工業、植物食品、生物晶片、基因體學、蛋白質體學、幹細胞為六大標的，各分為Part A：介紹各產業中相對應用之相關生物技術；Part B：針對各型產業之市場進行介紹與討論；Part C：進行生物技術產業案例之專題討論，務求學員由實務中得到知識也獲取寶貴經驗，以面對迷人又深具挑戰的生物科技產業。
description.en: The course is divided into two sections: (1) Fundamental of industry of biotechnology and (2) Advance of industry of biotechnology.Section (1) gives a general introduction from the aspect of analytical chemistry that covers protein chemistry and enzymology, micro- and macromolecule, tissue engineering, fine chemicals, food science, pharmaceutical and botanical sciences. Section (2) covers topics on bioindustry, nutritional science, bio-chip development, proteomics, protein science and stem cell research, in which the content is divided into three subparts namely, Part A An overview of technologies used in each topic; Part B An introduction to markets and trends; Part C Case study. We hope all participants will gain insight on today's biotechnology and get ready to meet future challenges.

name.zh: 生技相關產業優良製造規範

description.zh: 由於人口老化、國民所得提高、醫療支出增加與各種流行性傳染病等相關議題，生技相關產業已被世界公認為二十一世紀最具發展潛力之產業。下一波台灣的高科技產業應著重於以發明與創新為主的產業，而生技相關產業正是我國決定要發展之重大新興產業。由於生技相關產業應用範圍廣，附加價值高，故為提升其產業競爭力且加速進入國際市場，國內生技相關產業除了須提升產品品質、加強國際化的管理之外，亦須通過各國所採用的認證制度。此外，政府如何建構一健全完善的法規管理制度，更是生技相關產業發展成功的必要條件。目前國內醫藥產品相關法規，包括藥事法、醫療器材優良製造規範（GMP）及藥品優良製造規範（cGMP）等。由於近年國內外細胞療法之迅速發展，且人體細胞組織物之管理操作與傳統藥品並非完全相同之原因，我國特別訂定人體細胞組織優良操作規範（Good Tissue Practice，GTP），其目的為預防因使用人體細胞組織物而導入、傳播及擴散傳染病，並期望協助機構確保其人體細胞組織物未含有傳染病病原，在製造過程中未受污染，且不致因製造不當而影響人體細胞組織物效用與完整性。
description.en: Biotechnology-related industry has been recognized as the most potential business in twenty-first century. The next step of Taiwan's high technology should focus on the invention and innovation-based industry, which biotechnology should be included. Medical technology is a high value-added, application-board industry. To enhance its competitiveness and speed up access to international markets, producers need to ensure the product quality, strengthen the international management, conformity the regulation in all different countries. At present, the relevant laws and regulations of pharmaceutical products include the followings: the Pharmaceutical Affairs Law, good manufacturing practice of medical device (GMP), pharmaceutical Good Manufacturing Practices (cGMP) and the rapid development of cell therapy and the management of human cells and tissues (Good Tissue Practice, GTP) .

description.zh: 課程內容包括擴散原理、兩相之間的質傳理論，亂流的質量傳遞，涉及化學反應的質傳，同時發生質量與熱量的傳遞，以及多成分的擴散現象。
description.en: Topics covered include theory of diffusion, interphase mass transfer theory, mass transfer in turbulent flow, mass transfer with chemical reaction, simultaneous mass and heat transfer, multicomponent diffusion.

description.zh: 反應工程是在商業規模之考慮下對化學反應開發利用之相關工程活動。其目的在成功的設計和操作化學反應器，並使化學工程在工程專業中成為一個獨特的支系。此高等反應工程是延續大學部己學習在均相中有關之簡單觀念及理論，並推展到非均相較複雜系統之設計及操作上。學生在修習此課後，對於較複雜之反應器有清晰及整體之概念。
description.en: Under commercial scale consideration, chemical reaction engineering is that engineering concerning the exploitiaton of chemical reactions Its goal is the successful design and operation of chemical reactors and it sets chemical engineering apart as a distinct branch of the engineering profession. This aduanced chemical reaction engineering is a continuative study of simple idea and principle for homogeneous systems and extended to heterogeneous and more complex systems for design and operation. After study in this course, the student can obtain clear and unified coucept of complex reactor systems.

description.zh: 本課程著重於教授現代有機合成方法、反應機構、及其應用等知識，並幫助學生了解有機化學與生物化學、藥學等領域之相關性，進而拓展到將來學術及工業上的研究與應用。
description.en: This course focuses the contemporary developments in the study of the structure of carbon compounds and the mechanism of their reactions. Selected topics such as natural product, heterocyclic compound, stereochemistry, aromaticity, reaction intermediates, peptides synthesis and photochemistry will be included.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 介紹化工廠廢棄物對安全、健康、環境之影嚮及化工產品之生命週期評估。舊程序之製程改善及建立完整的廢棄物管理體系，以達廢棄物最少化之目的，新程序之設計則對反應器、分離程序、熱交換器之程序整合及公用設施等，實施源頭減廢及回收，以達潔淨生產之目的。
description.en: Introduction to the safety, health and environmental impact of wastes of chemical process industries and life cycle assessment of chemical engineering products. Waste minimization of existing process through changes in industrial process and setup of waste management hiarachy. For the new process, focus are on the source reduction and recycle of reactors, separators, heat exchange networks and utilities, etc.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於按照熱力學和原子機構的基本理論來解釋一些新發展，並以此來討論相變化的問題。內容有相變化之熱力學和擴散學理論，液相－固相及固相－固相相變化之討論。
description.en: The objective of this course to present a treatment of phase transformations in which these and other new developments could be explained in terms of the basic principles of thermodynamics and atomic mechanisms。The contents introduce thermodynamics and diffusion theories of phase transformations，and deal with liquid－solid phase transformations，solid－solid phase transformations。

description.zh: 1.電化學機構─似乾電池，法拉第定律2.腐蝕驅勢和電極電位─Nernst方程式，電位─pH圖3.極化和腐蝕速率─Evans圖4.鈍態理論─氧化膜理論和吸附理論5.防蝕法─陰、陽極防蝕法和抑制劑、鈍態劑防蝕6.八大類濕式腐蝕形態7.高溫腐蝕
description.en: Course Outline：1.Electrochemical Mechanisms─dry cell analogy and Faraday's law2.Corrosion Tendency and Electrode Potentials─Nernst equation, Pourbaix diagrams3.Polarization and Corrosion Rates─Evans diagrams4.Theories of Passivity─oxide film theory and adsorption theory of passivity5.Corrosion Prevention─cathodic and anodic protections, inhibitors, passivators6.Eight forms of Corrosion7.High Temperature Corrosion

description.zh: 本課程以介紹各種金屬表面被覆之基本原理，特性測試及其工程上之應用。內容有擴散被覆、PVD、CVD、電鍍及陽極處理等方法；基本真空技術，被覆層特性，以及表面被覆層之應用。
description.en: This course introduces the basic principles of metals surface coating，properties test and its engineering applications.The contents include Diffusion Coatings、PVD、CVD、Electroplatings and Anodic Coatings treatment；Elementary Vacuum Technologies，coating layer properties and its applications.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在於介紹一些廣泛、基本及實際的微電子材料（其中最主要者為積體電路之材料）。首先說明製造方法上之三個主要部分：擴散（diffusion）、平版照相術（lithography）及薄膜沉積（thin-film deposition）然後再介紹這些方法如何應用在各種元件所需之物理特性及元件設計有關之訊息後者則需要了解各種製造策略之目的及限制時再隨時給予介紹。1 .半導體物理特性基本概念，2.半導體製程初論，3 .薄膜製程原理，4 .擴散原理，5 .黃光製 程原理，6 .蝕刻製程原理，7 .晶片封裝，8 積體電路製程整合。本課程之目的在於介紹一些廣泛、基本及實際的微電子材料（其中最主要者為積體電路之材料）。首先說明製造方法上之三個主要部分：擴散（diffusion）、平版照相術（lithography）及薄膜沉積（thin-film deposition）然後再介紹這些方法如何應用在各種元件所需之物理特性及元件設計有關之訊息後者則需要了解各種製造策略之目的及限制時再隨時給予介紹。1 .半導體物理特性基本概念，2.半導體製程初論，3 .薄膜製程原理，4 .擴散原理，5 .黃光製 程原理，6 .蝕刻製程原理，7 .晶片封裝，8 積體電路製程整合。
description.en: This course is a special topics of Semiconductor Materials.

description.zh: 本課程將討論凝固組織之控制因子，平衡及非平衡狀態下金屬凝固現象，凝固界面之溶質分佈，單晶成長技術，凝固之過冷界面穩定理論，共晶型組織之成長，凝固之熱流分析，凝固之成核成長及粗性及均質處，理凝固理論之應用及鑄造工程簡介。
description.en: The subject area covers the following topics: Control variable of solidification structure and its application; Single crystal growths from the melt and solid; Heat flow in single crystal growth; Solute distribution in solidification, various cases will be treated in detail; Constitutional undercooling and interface stability; Solidification of castings and ingots; Lamellar eutectic growth; Nucleation growth and coarsening; Foundry engineering; Defects analysis in cast construction.

description.zh: 本課程在第一個問題上，我們將介紹材料發展上的挑戰，一者為材料與生物分子間的表面性質及特性﹔再者為材料做為細胞，生長模版並植入修復器官的效果。接著在第二個問題將以細胞為主題，介紹生物細胞學將是重要主題，如幹細胞生物學、細胞移動、組織環境、及組織功能基質細胞之研究等。在第三個問題上，主要描述特殊器官與工程學上之關係，與極可能在臨床的發展與應用。組織工程之性質與應用在外科,骨科和牙醫界。課程內容包括組織工程之發展,材料之應用,軟硬組織在生醫工程之應用。
description.en: The class is going to give a basic principle to the students in cell sources, cell-cell communications, stem cells, material for scaffold, extracellular matrix for tissue engineering. This class is intended not only as a class for engineering students and students in cell biology, biotechnology, and medical courses at advanced graduate level, but also as a reference tool for research and clinical laboratories. I believe the students can have the knowledge of tissue engineering after the class finished. The topics of this course include the tissue of bio-materials, and their applications in the orthopedic and dental fields. The course contains the development of biomaterials, the application of materialsfor tissue, composite materials in biomedical engineerings.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 探討物質表面之化學結構及性質，相關的理論基礎及技術。
description.en: This course will discuss the basic theories and techniques about the chemical structure and properties of material's surface.

description.zh: 對無機化合物之結構，化學性質等，利用量子化學，群論及結晶化學等加以探討。以配合天然礦物之形成，產狀，地球化學及環境化學等學科之授課內容。
description.en: The chemical structure and properties of inorganic compounds, which are useful for the following courses: the forming and occurrence of minerals, earth and environmental chemistry, will be discussed by using quantum chemistry, group theory and crystallography.

description.zh: 修習本課程宜具備土壤力學、岩石力學、工程地質基本概念。大地工程包含土壤工程、岩石工程及工程地質。高等大地工程(二)主要課程單元包括：(1)岩石材料與岩體的工程意義、(2)岩石應力與應變的關係與工程意義、(3) 岩石變形性與強度的工程意義(4)如何辨識不穩定邊坡(5)如何辨識不穩定隧道(6)岩石工程設計理念(7)案例研究等。
description.en: Students who having the basic course trainings of soil mechanics, rock mechanics, and engineering geology are welcome. Major topics of Advanced Geotechnical Engineering [II] consist of (1) Rock Material and Rock Mass (2)Stress and Stength (3)Deformability and Stength (4)Identify Unstable Rock Slope  (5)Identify Unstable Rock Tunnel (6)Rock Engineering Design (7) Engineering Case Studies.

description.zh: 1.原子及其結構 2.化學鍵 3.晶體結構原理 4.結構缺陷、成分與穩定性 5.鍵                                          結與物理性質 6.晶體與光 7.氧化物晶體化學 8.矽酸鹽晶體化學 9.金屬晶                                          體化學 10.高分子結晶化學
description.en: 1.Atoms and their structure 2.Chemicals bonds 3.Principles of crystal structures                                          4.Bonding and physical properties 5.Crystal defects、composition and stability                                          6.Crystal and light 7.Crystal chemistry of oxide 8.Crystal chemistry of silicate                                          9.Crystal chemistry of metal 10.Crystal chemistry of polymer

description.zh: 本課程是針對自然界因地質作用所引發的地質災害進行研究，尤其著重於各種地質災害的調查與分析。根據衛星影像與航照判釋、現場地質勘查與分析以及各種潛在危險災害發生率與影響性評估方法，對各種地質災害類型依發生頻率及潛在危險性，討論在區域開發上之限制與事前的整治防範。同時也分析各個地質災害案例，了解人與自然環境的互動關係。
description.en: In the past ten years, There have always been natural earth processes that are hazardous to people of Taiwan. Natural disasters such as typhoon, earthquakes, river flooding hazards, landslides, debris flow hazards and subsidences caused loss of life or property damage. These disasters made people realize that the natural processes that produce natural disasters must be recognized. They must be avoided where possible, and their threat to human life and property must be minimized.In fact, natural hazards are nothing more than natural processes. They become hazards only when people live or work in areas where these processes occur naturally. The purpose of this course is hoped to serve some methods to identify and analysis potentially hazardous processes. It is also provided some concepts and training to formulate various alternatives to avoid or minimize the threat to human life or property.

description.zh: 本課程介紹工程相關之主要數值分析方法及其於大地工程之應用，如有限差分法及有限元素法。透過實例問題之解析，使學生除了具有理論的基礎外，同時有能力藉著數值分析方法來分析大地工程問題。
description.en: This course introduces two representative numerical methods, i.e.  finite difference method and finite element method, and their application to geotechnical engineering.  Practical engineering problem are illustrated and simulated by numerical methods in the courses.  It aims to train the students to be familiar with either the theorem of numerical analysis or the application to engineering practices.

description.zh: 本課程主要為進階高等固態物理主題:包括基礎量子力學與統計、材料分析、超導、磁性及自旋電子元件、半導體元件、光電元件、原子與分子結構及雷射，低溫、表面和奈米材料等主題，以及探討其在各學科領域之應用。本課程第一部分主要介紹基礎量子力學與統計力學，並將特別介紹一系列巨觀量子效應之實例，包括量子霍爾效應、高溫超導、Bose-Einstein凝聚等有趣的現象。課程中第二部分將介紹奈米材料以及介觀物理、低維度奈米結構之光學性質及電荷傳輸特性。分別從低微體系、定態微擾理論與量子躍遷之關係、共振態與束縛態之關係、散射振幅與束縛定態能級的關係方面深入分析探討，並將特別討論對稱性問題及守恆量分析在散射理論中之重要性；更進一步介紹多體效應中之庫倫效應、協同效應、超導性質以及磁性問題 。最後我們將簡介最新固態物理主題，包括超導、類晶體、自旋玻璃態、稀磁性半導體等新穎領域。課程中藉由深入淺出之例題演練以及投影片及黑板講解，並配合習題演練使學生印象深刻、基礎紮實。以奠定學生日後研究上之深厚基礎。
description.en: Our goal in this course of advanced solid state physics is to provide those aspects of the theory and experiments, which are most needed for a advanced understanding of this topic. The course considers how the large-scale properties of solid materials result from their atomic-scale properties, through methods of quantum mechanics, crystallography, electromagnetism and metallurgy. The first part of this course is to introduce the foundations of quantum mechanics and statistics, including wave-particle duality, expectation value and measurement, eigenstates, boson and fermion. Secondly, we will explain some simple cases about mesoscopic physics of nano-structure materials, including free electron in 1D 2D and 3D, quantum slabs, quantum wires and quantum dots, tunneling and transition problems, transport theory and noise, quantum optics, many body effects and introductory group theory. Finally, we will introduce modern research in this field, including quasicrystals , spintronics , supe

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於從科學哲學層次、研究方法層次、與實際操作層次探討設計研究的本質，內容包括界定設計研究問題、選用適當的量化或質性研究方法與特定工具、研究結果詮釋、案例解析、以及論文寫作等，俾使同學具備研究之基礎觀念以及進行創作或論文寫作之能力。研究方法二強調質性研究，例如：以深度訪談以及參與式觀察法探究互動行為脈絡，課程內容包含質性研究導論、質性研究過程與步驟、質性研究設計、質性研究方法、譯碼的程序、質性資料蒐集與分析、質性研究報告撰寫、質性研究在創新設計研究上的應用。教學以課堂講授與論文研討與發表為主要方式，並以隨堂測驗、報告與分組討論與發表為評量依據。
description.en: The aims of this course are to explore the nature of design research at the three various levels of scientific philosophy, research methods, and practical execution. The contents involve the introduction of defining the design problems, selecting the quantitative or qualitative research methods and specific instruments, interpretation of research results, case studies, as well as writing a thesis.This course provides graduate students with the ability of fundamental concept and design creation or research thesis. These research methods two focus on qualitative research with the exploration of in-depth interview and participant observation. The details of content includes introduction, research process and approaches, research design, research methods, coding scheme, data collection and analysis, writing up and implication of innovation and design. The teaching methods include lectures, paper discussion and presentation based on the course assessment of assigned project, panel discuss

name.en: Special Topics on Interactive Media Design (II)

description.zh: 本課程為一延續性的專題研究，其目標在於研討互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術之相關研究專題，以文獻研讀、論文研讀討論以及個案研究為重點，藉由密集討論、書面報告以及設計專題之研究與實作，學生可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗，並具備研究、分析、實作之能力。本所以結合電子資訊、機電、人文、設計與藝術等各領域的學生，以整合培育互動媒體設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具設計、藝術、資訊、機電等專長的研究生，協同完成互動媒體設計專題的研究，或是透過互動媒體設計個案研討、互動媒體設計專題創作的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專題實作為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。
description.en: This special topic is a continuous course within two semesters. This course is to explore the fields of interaction design, interactive media and interactive art and focus on the literature study, paper discussion and case studies. With panel discussion, research report and design practice, graduate students can be able to learn the ability of research, analysis and practice by effectively exchange opinions and personal experience. The aim of graduate of interactive media design is to integrate different disciplines from computer science, mechatronics, human-culture and design and art so as to foster the professional of interactive media design. Therefore, one of the aims of this course is to construct a multi-disciplines learning environment which performs a topic-oriented study model. This study model formulates the graduate students of design, art, information and mechatronic disciplines to collaborate a interactive media design project. It may execute interactive media design by wo

description.zh: 有鑒於國內的教育制度主張男女擁有平等的權利，但實際結果卻是女學生在理工科系方面成為少數族群，本課程以增進女性參與人機互動為主要目標，結合一連串的研習營教學與展示技術的引入，教導有關互動科技技術等相關應用，並透過了解性別研究的主要流派與其理論，來確認性別研究與互動設計的性質與功能，期待學生能再了解性別研究的主要理論後，能把它應用於互動設計以及創意發想上，以因應未來女性經濟力的快速掘起。
description.en: The education system of Taiwan claims that men and women are equal. The truth is that female students are only a minority of the department of the science and engineering, not to mention the percentage of the further education in this field. Based on this concept, we plan the interactive curriculum. We will go to give instruction about the interactive technology. In order to test the spot reaction and track the reaction after the exhibition when the exhibition is ongoing, we will apply Radio-frequency identification. The outdoor education and the indoor education; the two complement each other and expecting this exhibition to encourage more female students to discovery the science and have better achievements in this field.

description.zh: 本課程將探討互動科技運用於當代表演藝術之可能性與相關發展，並介紹互動表演形式與美學、電腦視覺與電腦聆聽、即時影像處理、即時音訊合成等，並藉由實際展演計畫之提案與執行，透過跨領域合作，讓學生有機會將互動科技與表演藝術結合。「互動表演藝術 II」將注重表演計畫之實際執行、跨界合作之溝通與協調、即時互動影像設計、時序設計、相關軟硬體設置、與實際排練。
description.en: This course will explore the potential of incorporating interactive technology in performing arts and will also review the existing repertoire. In addition, topics about the form, the aesthetics of interactive performing arts, computer vision, computer listening, real-time video processing, and real-time audio synthesis will also be covered. Students will be asked to bring forth their proposal of interactive performing arts and to realize their work through formal presentation combining interactive technology and performing arts. "Interactive Performing Arts II" will deal mainly with proposal realization, interdisciplinary cooperation, real-time interactive video design, sequential design, equipment setup, and rehearsal arrangement.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹準則作曲的概念與技巧、並教導使用 Max/MSP/Jitter 物件導向程式設計工具，來設計準則作曲系統與即時音訊處理工具。主要內容將包含：準則作曲程式設計、即時音訊之播放與錄音系統設計、音色合成與再合成、數位效果器之設計。此外，本課程亦將介紹音訊偵測與分析技巧。學生將被要求以 Max/MSP/Jitter 設計聲音裝置、互動音樂展演系統、或音樂教學程式，透過實作來學習音樂、音訊相關的程式設計。
description.en: This course will focus upon algorithmic composition and real-time audio processing using object-oriented programming language Max/MSP/Jitter. Subjects including algorithmic composition, real-time audio recording, playback, synthesis, re-synthesis, and effects will be covered. Techniques about audio detection and analysis will also be introduced. Students will be asked to build a system with Max/MSP for sound installations, real-time interactive music, or music pedagogy.

description.zh: 新興數位學習媒體的開發日新月異，再加上資訊存取的高效能數位化，使得科技輔助的數位學習之路更形寬廣、開闊。電子書於知識傳遞的介面上，扮演了關鍵性的角色。傳統上以行為理論推衍而來的人機介面學習模式已然過於狹隘，因為數位時代中的學習者角色已由被動轉為主動，由行為導向轉為認知導向、意義導向以及脈絡導向，而資訊的解讀與詮釋更從單一性、制式化轉為開放性、多元化。對於致力於創新數位學習科技的開發者而言，針對學習者的學習模式重新加以審視是極為迫切的，如此方能以嶄新的角度去開發新的學習潛能和發展性。本課程目的即是從心理學、認知科學及資訊處理的角度來探討新型數位學習模式以及其應用方法，並探討數位學習成效評估系統的建立方案，形塑電子書於知識鴻海的無限可能。
description.en: The rapid development of digital learning and emerging learning technologies, as well as effective information storage platforms, have made traditional learning theory insufficient and less productive in guiding instructional designs for contemporary educational development. New available learning technologies therefore call for the need to re-consider new learning theories. For that, the definitions and mechanism of learning and learners have become more multidimensional and open-ended, instead of being singular and standardized in conventional perception. For those who are devoted to create new technological applications for learning, it is no doubt critical to construct new mechanism of learning in current highly digitized era. This course will discuss relevant cognitive learning theories from research in psychology and education, and contemplate how new e-learning solutions can be evaluated.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹人機介面設計過程中與人的認知行為相關之心智活動知識，俾使學生能在進行互動介面設計中，具備充分之認知科學基礎並加以應用，使介面之設計符合使用者的認知需求並具備使用上的效率與舒適度。課程內容包含認知心理學概論、認知心理與介面設計、腦神經認知、感覺訊號的知覺、注意力、記憶力、心智圖象、認知發展、問題解決、創造力以及認知與行為績效等。教學將以課堂講授以及學生分組討論與發表為主要方式，並以報告撰寫以及分組討論與發表為評量依據。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the knowledge of recognition for interactive design. Students can understand the recognition knowledge and apply it to interactive design, which can meet user recognition requirements and be equipped with efficiency and effectiveness. The contents include recognition introduction, brain nerve recognition, sensor recognition, attention, memory, mental map, recognition development, problem-solution, creative ability and behavior performance. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, group discussion and presentation, and evaluated by student's reports and oral presentation.

name.zh: 互動情境劇本設計企劃

description.zh: 引導學生從人、事、物、環境生活中，發想概念劇本與設計，撰寫文字腳本、分鏡圖，很多概念影片皆是情境劇本發展出來，用工具作創意表現。課程含故事表達，收集，與創意故事發展。本課程之目標在於介紹情境劇本法 (scenario) 之相關知識與其在互動設計上之應用。修習此課程之學生可學習互動情境劇本設計之原理與實作模擬，並具備業界所需之互動介面設計企劃之實務能力與研究分析能力。課程內容包含互動設計理論、情境劇本法、人--機--境概念、互動情境模擬、故事板製作、互動情境劇本設計與互動介面設計演練等。教學方式將以課堂講授、實作演練以及設計企劃案撰寫為主，並以學生的實作發表以及報告為評量方式。
description.en: This course guides students to create scenario design from human, event, object and environment, through drafting script and story board. This course is focused on introducing the knowledge of scenario and its application to interaction design. Students can understand the theory story description, collection and development, so as to do practical work. It is expected that students can be capable of scenario design, design planning and research for practical use. The contents include interaction design, scenario, human-machine-environment, interactive scenario development, story board drafting and practice. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, practical work and scenario proposal, and evaluated by student's reports, and practical work presentation.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This seminar focuses on report writing of research, group study, and training of students' research ability.

description.zh: 使學生瞭解科學研究的特性、研究的類型、測量的程序與工具、資料的收集、資料的分析、撰寫研究計畫的方法，在從事管理問題之研究與探討時，知道如何正確選用適當方法，並取得所需資訊。
description.en: This course will introduce the selection of a research topic, construction of a bibliography, literature survey and data collection, and preparation of a research proposal.

description.zh: 知識發現與資料探勘課程的目的在研究應用資料探勘技術、資料倉儲技術及知識發現技術，以從企業經營資料庫中，探勘出對提升產業競爭力有幫助的知識，其包含下列主題: 1.知識發現與資料探勘概論 2.資料倉儲技術在資料探勘的應用 3.資料處理技術 4.教導型學習方法 5.教導型學習方法 6.關聯法則探勘 7.資料探勘在產業經營管理的應用
description.en: The knowledge discovery and data mining course is to study the applications of the modern knowledge discovery and data mining techniques and to retrieve useful business knowledge for large enterprises to maintain a competitive edge. The course covers the following topics. 1.Knowledge discovery and data mining basics 2.Data warehousing techniques for data mining 3.Data processing 4.Supervised learning 5.Unsupervised learning 6.Association rules mining 7.Applications of data mining and knowledge discovery techniques to business management.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討供應鏈與物流管理之相關議題。物流管理為供應鏈管理重要之一環。供應鏈管理係從供應商、製造商到最終顧客，對整個製造與配銷通路的整合性管理策略。本課程內容包含供應鏈管理之策略發展、物流管理、供應鏈管理之相關功能、供應鏈管理之績效衡量、及供應鏈管理之主要困難點。本課程將同時探討與供應鏈管理相關之議題，如存貨理論、資訊系統整合、及供應契約等。本課程理論與實務並重、案例研討也將為本課程重要之一環。
description.en: This course intends to introduce essential topics regarding supply chain and logistic management. Supply chain management is an integrated approach to manage the total flow of manufacturing and distribution channel from supplier to ultimate customer. The contents of this course include the development of supply chain management strategies, logistic management, supply chain management functions, supply chain management performance evaluation, and major challenges of supply chain management. Certain topics related to supply chain management, such as inventory policy, information system integration, and supply contract will also be addresses. This course focuses on both theoretical and practical issues. Real world case study will be an important part of this course.

description.zh: 本課程介紹管理會計和控制等之成本會計概念介紹，本課程之目的在了解管理會計之實務與應用內涵，並藉以設計及發展管理資訊系統另外，本課程也針對與管會相關之介紹(just-in-time, balanced scorecards, profitability center, investment center …等)與管理決策(外包或自製, 增加產品線,績效評估…等)
description.en: This course deals with management accounting and control both within a micro-behavioural and within an organisational theory perspective. The aim is to provide an understanding of the developments in management accounting and control theory and practice and the implications of critical variables that affect the design, development and operation of management accounting and control systems. Practical aspects of management accounting are mainly examined through computer assisted learning (CAL). Students are expected to cover the prescribed reading on their own, and to perceive the taught seminars as the opportunity to ask questions and to offer their views at any time.

description.zh: 本課程討論利用統計方法進行品質管制，品管方法將運用於市場、設計、採購、生產與檢測。此外，並介紹如何利用全面品管建立並維持高效率之企業組織，以六標準差技術改善產品開發、製造與服務。
description.en: This course provides a fundamental understanding of statistical quality control concept. Areas for quality implementation will include functions such as marketing, design, purchasing, production, inspection, etc. This class also enables the students to recognize the foundation to create and sustain an effective organization through total quality management. Finally, the class provides comprehensive focus on six sigma that has been found to improve product, service and process.

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於幫助學生瞭解財務決策的理論架構，主要著重於介紹財務管理的基本原理，以及其如何運用在財務經理所面對的主要決策上。希望學生於修習本課程後，能瞭解各種財務管理的工具，並能有效率地使用於投資與融資決策上。
description.en: This course is to build up the financial framework for students when making financial decisions. The focus is on setting out the basic principles of financial management and applying them to the main decisions faced by the financial managers. It helps students to understand various tools of financial management and use them effectively when making investment and financing decisions.

description.zh: 本課程的目的在學習各種運籌系統分析的模式與方法，主要分別從供給面與需求面探討運籌系統，並且探討供給與需求之間的均衡分析。課程內容包含：網路設計、分析與最佳化、等候理論、網路均衡指派、動態網路分析、以及商用車輛營運管理與車輛路線問題等。
description.en: The focus of this course is on the models and algorithms for logistics system analysis. In addition to discussing the supply and demand sides of logistics systems, this course aims to analyze the equilibrium between supply and demand. The main topics include, but not limited to, network design, analysis, and optimization, queueing theory, network equilibrium assignment, dynamic network analysis, and commercial vehicle operation and vehicle routing and scheduling.

description.zh: N
description.en: Piles of literature indicated that technology have been the main source of wealth creation of nations and that of competitive advantage of firms, with a special attention on semiconductor sector and system-on-chip technology. Moreover, technology has also become more complex, uncertain and expensive than ever before. Along with rapid technological change, it is imperative for firms to manage technology in an active and integrated way in order to survive and compete in the increasingly globalized markets. Drawn upon theoretical articles and empirical case study, the course aims to provide a comprehensive understanding of Management of Technology (MOT) with both micro (technology and firm) level and macro (secot and policy) level.

description.zh: 專題報告 專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminars, Group meeting

description.zh: 本課程主要邀請學術界或企業界的學者專家，從理論或實務的角度，經由演講介紹近代的服務與科技管理專題，促使學生更深入及廣面瞭解管理現狀或趨勢。
description.en: This seminar course invites guest speakers from well known companies to share their experiences of service and technology management and provide students the updated practices and management trends in the field.

description.zh: 透過企業實務實習, 培養學生將所學理論應用於業界實務, 並透過與企業組織的座談互動, 促進 MBA 學生對管理實務的認識與了解, 以期從中體認課堂理論與實務的連結與應用。
description.en: The course is designed to broaden students` management pracitce. Through executing projects, students are expected to increase their understandings of managerial practices, as well as the connection and application between theoretical knowledge and business practices.

description.zh: 本課程旨在讓學生學習服務設計之基礎知識，包含服務設計原理、服務設計方法、服務設計流程等，並了解目前服務設計之發展現況。透過此課程，學生可以習得基礎服務設計能力，並應用於實務。
description.en: The target of this course is to teach students with regular design training offered by existing design discipline so as to make them equip the abilities to conduct service design. The course starts with the introduction of some basic knowledge, tools, and process of design, and then explores necessary concepts and techniques used for design services. This course is delivered through lecture and hands-on projects, so that students can develop their design attitude and abilities by dealing with real world issues. This course also serves as the basis for students to move forward to take other service design related learning subjects, such as service experience design, interaction design.

description.zh: 多變量分析及處理二項以上變項的統計，分析技術、常用于管理，經濟，財務，會計等之分析‧ 課程內容：因素分析、主成份分析、複迴歸分析、區別分析、多變項異數分析典型相關分析、集群分析、聯合分析、直線方程式模式
description.en: Multivariate analysis is to analyze more than two variables simultaneously, and to be able to apply to management, economics, accounting…etc. The contents of the course: factor analysis, principal component analysis, multiple regression analysis, multiple discriminate analysis, multiple analysis of variance, canonical correlation analysis, cluster analysis, conjoint analysis, SEM…etc.

description.zh: 本課程包含以下議題：網際網路、網路服務、語意網及網路探勘。學生將瞭解網路趨勢、目前的狀況、應用及目前研究面臨的挑戰。1.本課程包含下列四大項目第一部份: Web Service: 概論，技術與應用第二部分: Semantic Web：概論，技術與應用第三部分: Web Mining: 概論，技術與應用第四部分: 整合議題：Semantic web services, Semantic web mining大部分時間將用於第二部份: Semantic Web,期末報告為上述議題之一的實作與展示。
description.en: This is an advanced course involving topics in Internet/Web, Web Services, Semantic Web and Web Mining. Students will gain an understanding of the trends, current status, applications and research challenges of these exciting areas. In this class, we will examine these topic areas by reading and discussing both existing web specifications and cutting-edge research papers. Each area will be organized with an introductory overview, then dive down into the technologies, applications and research challenges. We will also give an overview of where these areas can meet, and examine how a closer integration could be profitable.Part 1: Web Services: Overview, technologies, applicationsPart 2: Semantic Web: Overview, technologies, applicationsPart 3: Web Mining: Overview, technologies, applicationsPart 4: Integration issues: Semantic web services, Semantic web mining

name.en: Case Study of Corporate Merger & Acquisition

description.zh: 本課程個案研究目標公司包括科技公司與金融機構，可能牽涉之法律有：企業併購法、公司法、證券交易法、金融機構合併法、金融控股公司法、勞動基準法等。本課程主要內容有1.概括併購政策議題。 2.併購交易的財務結構、會計、評價與法律議題。
description.en: This course covers several topics: 1. General policy issues surrounding mergers and acquisitions. 2. The financial structuring of the deal, accounting issues, valuation, and legal issues.

name.zh: 智慧財產權服務業商業模式
name.en: Business Model of Intellectual Property Service Industry

description.zh: 智慧財產權的應用由於NPE之興起，引起全世界的重視，歐美大公司視為未來重要策略。為了培養本國智慧財產權服務業，本課程將探討國際上近年來興起的智慧財產權各種商業模式，評估其優劣點及台灣可能發展應用之方向。
description.en: The application of intellectual property is a hot topic internationally. Especially, the rising of NPE litigation or other legal practices. In order to bring up the service industry of intellectual property in Taiwan. This course will emphasize the business model of intellectual property service industry worldwide. Comparison and application between Taiwan and other countries will be addressed.

name.en: Seminar on technology transfer and licensing

description.zh: 本課程旨在使學生熟悉智財基礎授權與應用模式。並將以企業授權實例，使學生了解企業授權實務會遭逢之困難、風險與可採取之因應措施。
description.en: This course aims at making students familiar with the application and operation of licensing from understanding basic licensing models. This course will also introduce specific licensing cases issues to make students realize possible difficulties and risks and take appropriate measures when engaging in the licensing process.

name.en: Management of Intellectual Property and Creativity

description.zh: 創新已成為工商界最重要的經營磐石，無創新即無藍海，只能作跟隨者。本課程將探討如何將不同之智財權中引入創新元素，與創新的概念結合，縮短研發及創新之流程，並進一步發展智財權服務業。
description.en: Creativity is the cornerstone of modern enterprise. No creativity means enterprise will only be a follower, not strategy creator. This course will focus on the concept creation of intellectual property. Bring the creation elements into intellectual property. Educate students to shorten the R & D process and improve the creation flowchart. Eventually, students will learn how to create the new service industry.

description.zh: 本課程是針對高科技產業行銷管理的進階課程，目的是以行銷管理理論及案例討論方式，幫助學生熟悉高科技產業分析與行銷管理策略。關鍵概念包括傳統的行銷管理、高新技術產業B2B行銷管理、高科技導論、高科技企業之策略與企業文化、關係行銷、高科技企業之市場導向及研發與行銷的互動、高科技市場的行銷研究、了解高科技市場之顧客、高科技市場之後配銷通路與供應鏈管理、高科技市場之定價考量、高科技市場之廣告及促銷、及電子化企業及電子商務等研討。
description.en: This is an advanced course in marketing management for high-tech firms. The objective is to help students become familiar with industrial analysis and marketing management through marketing theories and cases. The key concepts include traditional marketing management, B2B Marketing Management, the introduction of high-tech Industry marketing, high-tech company's strategy and culture, relation marketing, marketing-R&D interaction, marketing research in high-tech markets, understanding high-tech customers, distribution channels and supply chain management, pricing consideration on high-tech marketing, advertising and promotion, E-business, case study, and term project.

description.zh: 本課程主要包括下列主題：1.全球企業發展的外在環境、2.全球技術突破與創新產業、3.各國研發創新及品牌智財策略、4.IP產業建置、5.全球品牌智財市場、6.全球企業及其智財管理的規劃與移轉、7.創新研發的保護方式、8.協同合作與獨立作業的比較、9.兼顧節稅的智慧財產權開發模式、10.跨國視野下的法律議題、11.企業智財部門規劃、12.併購與智財授權管理、13.品牌智財的財務價值、14.著名全球企業智財管理模式。
description.en: This course will focus on the following topics: 1.external environments for corporate developments, 2.new technologies and innovative enterprises, 3. R&D and branding polices of major countries, 4. the establishment of IP industries, 5. global branding markets, 6. the plan and transfer of global enterprises & IP location, 7. the protection of R&D, 8.the choice between joint and individual R&D, 9. tax plan for IP development, 10.IP plan for international industries, 11, the establishment of IP department, 12.M&A and IP, 13.the evaluation of brands & IP, 14.the IP management of well-known global enterprises,

name.zh: 國際智權契約與技術移轉

description.zh: 本課程將探討(1)智財商業模式與智財交易(2)英美契約法(3)智財授權契約規範(4)授權程序與稽核(5)技術合作契約(6)智財合資契約及章程
description.en: This course will illustrate the following issues: (1) IP Business Model and IP Transactions, (2) Anglo-American Contract Law,  (3) Definition,  Regulation, Types & Management of IP License,  (4)License Agreement Auditing for Licensing Business, (5)  Technical Cooperation Contract, (6) IP Joint Venture Contract and Articles of Association.

description.zh: NONE
description.en: NONE

description.zh: NONE
description.en: NONE

description.zh: 請參閱英文說明。
description.en: This is a research-based course. The course covers international IP treaties, IP-related provisions in some free trade agreements, and judicial decisions related to those international IP treaties. Eight research topics will be assigned to the participating students. The research-based course includes:--Module One: International law 101--Module Two: IP treaties; IP provisions in FTAs--Module Three: Case law--Module Four: In-depth studies請參閱英文說明。

description.zh: 本課程為工程技術組必修，分為綠建築、建築構法、數位媒體、建築生產、建築在利用、環境控制等專題，每學期視任課老師專長輪流開設兩至三個專題，採用分組方式個別指導，每位學生必須修習兩個不同專題。本課程將針對建築實務中所面對之技術課題進行個案研究並模擬操作其設計至細部設計階段。
description.en: This is a design studio class, focused on the technical side for topics as Green Building, Building Systems, Digital Design Media, Building Production, Building Reuse, Environment Control, and others were be included. There will have only two or three topics in each semester, depends on the teacher's specialty, and each student needs take two topics in one year.

class.name: 永續建築外國學生專班

description.zh: 隨著資訊技術與網路科技的發展，促成了城市發展的新樣態。IBM公司在全球化背景下針對社會變遷、科技應用、綠能環保、及永續發展等問題，提出了「智慧城市」的新思維。在國際間也引發其研究與規劃的創新領域。台灣近幾年來為能達成「智慧台灣」的發展目標，並推動台灣的智慧城市及相關產業發展，經濟部技術處在2009年中成立了「經濟部智慧生活科技運用計畫推動辦公室」，以推動智慧生活科技運用計畫，除將帶動「智慧生活」產業的發展，也將師法國外典範進行「智慧城市」的規劃，打造台灣的智慧城市。本課程即在上述國家重大發展策略的架構下，引領建築與都市設計研究所的研究生，透過專論與實作的方式，探討未來「智慧城市」的思維，並透過與資訊科技跨領域知識的整合，融入智慧生活的需求，提出「智慧城市」規劃的架構、願景與策略。
description.en: This course introduces graduate students to the newly developed concept about the intelligent cities and how they are planned and implemented. The concept of intelligent city was proposed by the IBM with globalization background. It is a new and innovation research field, which include inter-discipline integration. The course is organized into two parts: Part1 explore the Basic which to form an intelligent city. It will start with classroom lecture, speech and paper reading and using intelligent cities case study around the world as references. We will examine the key components that form an intelligent city. Part2 will use a target community as a practical case study area and use people participation and community enforcement model to propose a prototype of an intelligent city will be. The results will be illustrated and presented to the local community.

class.name: 永續建築外國學生專班

description.zh: 幫助學生認識一般科技文章以及科技論文語法、文體、句子結構等，並加強英文口頭表達之能力。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等，可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Workshop, Group discussion, Seminars, Mechatronics in Modern Industries.

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習研究論文組織寫作﹐包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧﹐正確組織文章的各個片段﹐避免口語用字寫字的陋習﹐使所作之文章能掌握其涵意﹐亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文之佳作。
description.en: The goal of English Technical Writing is to help students developing the writing skills through the manipulation of scientific and technical data. Students will learn a variety of rhetorical principles that guide the writing process, apply these principles to scientific and technical writing, and write papers in their own academic fields. Lectures on the writing principle, students' presentations on the reading sections and follow-up activities, pair and individual work on writing practice will be the major activities in the class.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the management related journals. The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

notes: 工商博所和工管所博班合開

description.zh: 本課程提供所有博士生共同參與研究討論的園地。將進行設計專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is a joint seminar for all the doctoral students, which will be progressed by paper presentation of special topics on design issues, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 設計領導係指領導設計與透過設計領導事業，環視益形挑戰與機會的設計創新環境，深具前瞻洞察力的願景與策略是贏得設計領導地位之關鍵因素。本課程含蓋相關文獻理論與實務案例，透過個案研討深入探究如何贏得企業設計領導競爭優勢與永續繁榮成功之道。
description.en: Design leadership means to design and to lead-to lead design and to lead business by design. Today, those responsible for design creation face leadership challenges and opportunities greater than ever before. Who should lead design? Who leads by design? How and why does a company "lead with design?" Design leadership has many interpretations, ranging from inspiration to collaboration and from culture to globalization. Design leadership is a commercial imperative. It creates differentiation, sustains competitive advantage, and enables world-class performance that is sustainable into the future.This course will provide the insight and interaction essential to utilizing design leadership for business success. Vision and strategy are the critical elements of leadership. It covers the strategy and the effects of inspiring design leadership and the personal characteristics and attributes of great design leaders.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

name.zh: 光電化學與太陽能電池

description.zh: 光電化學即利用太陽光能源或其他光源驅使一個完整的電化學氧化還原反應，並充分使用光電催化反應後產生的電子轉換為電力，即為太陽能電池，其中有機材料、無機材料與電解質為太陽光電池反應時主要的影響因素。本課程將會介紹光電化學原理與測定, 光電催化, 光電化學能轉移及儲存,不同材料發展出不同型態的太陽能電池，進而介紹光電化學如何應用於染料敏化太陽能電池。
description.en: The concept of photoelectrochemistry is to utilize the solar energy and other light sources to drive a complete electrochemical oxidation-reduction reaction where the photocatalytic electron reaction has been converted into electrical energy. Photovoltaic cells which also known as solar cells composed of organic and inorganic materials and electrolytes are the great example for the photoelectrochemical reactions. Here the proposed course is constructed to introduce and implement the basic photoelectrochemical principles, measurements, photoelectrocatalysis, photoelectrical charge transfer and the storage of chemical energy. Further the remaining section of this course will be focused on the detailed studies about the development of different inorganic, organic materials for the fabrication of dye-sensitized solar cells.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 本課程目的在介紹微觀之固體表面結構與現象。課程內容包括微觀之固體表面結構，固體表面之吸附、擴散、脫附現象，表面偏析現象，分子和表面間之鍵結，表面反應的熱力學與動力學，以及各種表面分析的技術。
description.en: This course is designated to acquaint the student with atomic-level understanding of surface structure and surface phenomena. The course focuses on the surproperties of the solid-gas and solid-vacuum interfaces because most of the results of modern surface-science studies on the atomic level come from the scrutiny of these interfaces. It contains the following topics: the atomic-level structure of clean and adsorbate-covered surfaces, adsorption and desorption, surface diffusion, surface segregation, the nature of the surface bonding, the adsorbate-adsorbate interaction, energy transfer during gas-surface interactions and surface reaction; surface analysis techniques.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 本課程將涵蓋討論光電學之基本應用原理並結合分子生物學之知識 （諸如 脫氧核糖核酸核糖核酸 蛋白質 或細胞的基本結構介紹） 希望能更拓展學員對光電學應用的眼界本課程目標將藉由了解光電探測儀器之操作應用,光源控制,與光源種類之差異（諸如gamma射線, X-射線, UV 光,紅外線與可見光), 進而將之應用於生物分子的觀察,與生命科學應用上,範圍之廣無可界限.
description.en: This course covers optoelectronics combine with biomolecular of knowledge. We will focus on discussing how the DNA, RNA, protein or cells related with optoelectronic application.Optoelectronics is the study and application of electronic devices that source, detect and control light, usually considered a subfield of photonics. The light often includes invisible forms of radiation such as gamma rays, X-rays, ultraviolet and infrared, in addition to visible light, which is based on the quantum mechanical effects of light on semiconducting materials. A biomolecule is any organic molecule that is produced by a living organism, including large polymeric molecules such as proteins, polysaccharides, and nucleic acids as well as small molecules such as primary metabolites, secondary metabolites, and natural products. As organic molecules, biomolecules consist primarily of carbon and hydrogen, nitrogen, and oxygen, and, to a smaller extent, phosphorus and sulfur.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 本課程將邀請專家學者以專題演講方式，介紹電力工程、電力電子工程之最新科技與應用。研究生亦被安排報告其研究計畫與進度。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、及舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: This course will introduce the latest technologies and applications to the power and power electronics engineering. Speakers are the Well-known scholars and specialists. Graduate students will also be arranged to report their graduate studies. The participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, and further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 本研究討論課程之目的在使研究生學習控制工程、通訊工程、計算機工程之最新科技。受邀演講之著名專家學者透過廣泛的討論分享其研究結果與經驗，選修此課程之研究生亦須就其研究主題進行正式報告。
description.en: The seminar course is designed for graduate students to learn the latest technologies in the areas of control, communications and computer engineering. Renowned researchers and scholoars are invited to share their research results and experience through extensive discussion. Furthermore, all students in this course are required to make formal presentations on their specialized topics.

description.zh: 讓學生對於模糊邏輯、模糊推論有一整體性了解，並對於將模糊邏輯在控制工程之應用具有理論與軟體撰寫之能力。
description.en: 1. To familiarize students with fuzzy logic and fuzzy inference. 2. To familiarize students with designing controllers based on fuzzy inference. 3. To familiarize students with system modeling through fuzzy rules.

description.zh: 1. 變頻器2. 電力轉換器3. 直流截波器4. 電源供應器
description.en: 1. INVERTER 2. CONVERTER 3. DC CHOPPER 4. POWER SUPPLY

description.zh: 1.Core 的特性分析2.Choke 設計3.高頻變壓器設計4.Core 的特性實習5.Choke 實習6.高頻變壓器實習
description.en: 1.Analysis of core2.Design of choke3.High frequency transformer design4.Practice of core,choke and high frequency transformer

name.en: Design and Analysis of Computer Algorithms

description.zh: 本課程介紹電腦科學中演算法的原理、分析與設計策略，使學生了解各種演算法的設計，訓練如何分析解決實際的問題，以便學生可以設計有效率的電腦演算法程式，進而了解問題的難易，增加實作演算法能力。課程內容包括學習分析一個演算法的複雜度與界定一個問題難度的下界，並完整介紹整套NP-completeness計算理論。其中關於解決問題所使用的有效技巧，課程中將介紹一般常用的「貪婪法」、「各個擊破法」、「樹狀搜尋法」、「修剪與搜尋」、與「動態規劃法」及其它主題。同時課程中也將簡介演算法新的發展方向，包括「近似演算法」、「攤還分析」、「隨機演算法」、「線上演算法」等概念。最後並透過相關論文的研讀及討論，以了解近代演算法的最新發展趨勢。
description.en: The course includes: Mathematical background、Basic analysis techniques、Computational complexities、Worst case analysis and average case analysis、Basic Design Paradigms、Divide and conquer、Greedy methods、Dynamic programming、Probabilistic algorithms、Computational Complexity、Linear reduction of problems、NP-completeness。

description.zh: 1 設計的基本概念 2 架構、資料型別與運算子 3 組合與循序邏輯 4 函式/程序與屬性/組態 5 階層式設計 6 功能與時序模擬 7 設計合成 8 狀態機設計 9 管線式處理 10.記憶體設計 11.特殊應用積體電路設計與實作
description.en: This course both provides the digital logical concepts and trains the student how to use the computer-aided design tools to simulate and to implement the advanced FPGA system. The contents of this course are listed as following: 1.Design concepts to logic circuits 2.Structure, data type and operator 3.Combinationa-circuit and Sequential-circuit 4.Function/process and task/attribute 5.Architectural design 6.Functional and timing simulation 7.Synthesizer 8.State machine design 9.Pipelined process 10.RAM and ROM 11.ASIC design and implementation.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。包括Wavelet轉換、變分法及積分方程等工程分析之技術，且以Matlab軟體來應用至影像處理、噪音振動、最佳控制、偏微分方程等工程應用實例。.
description.en: Including Wavelet transform, Variation principle, and integral equation Engineering Analysis technology, try to use Matlab software apply to Image processing, denoise, optimal control, and solving partial differential equations.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。技術的關鍵特性和技術之生命週期，企業核心技術、來源和取得，技術的管理與風險，國家科技政策之影響，企業與技術生存之道，全球創新產品之開發，全球創新產品的技術策略與戰略，未來趨勢和走向。
description.en: Technological Innovation: Process, Content, and Types, Organization & Organizing for Innovation, Planning and Discontinuous Innovation, Concurrent Engineering and Interface Management, Human Resource Management, Technology Strategy, Dominant Design, Standard, and Compatibility External R&D and Alliances, Competencies and Knowledge Management in R&D Setting, Design and Product Innovation, Global R&D and Product Development, Industrial Research & Development, Assessment and Performance Appraisal, Perspective.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 自動化機械設計、驅動器及感測器、自動化機構合成及應用、數位電路設計及應用、氣液壓及電控回路之邏輯設計、監控系統、自動化系統之規化及評估。
description.en: Automated Machinery Design, Actuators and sensors, Automatic mechanism synthesis and applications, Logic design of pneumatic, Hydraulic and electronic control loop, Monitor and control system, automation system, Planning evaluation.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。科技管理是一門結合科技、商事及法律的課程。主要是希望透過資訊科技相關基礎知識，以整合組織內部資源，提升組織對於科技運籌帷幄的能力，進而達成組織最終目的。相較於傳統的MBA，科管所除了必須具備一般的管理知識外，更著重在於高科技產業方面相關專業知識的強化。
description.en: This is a course combining Technology, commerce and law. It aims to integrate the resources of the organization via information technology and raise the competitiveness. Comparing with MBA, except the courses of general knowledge management, Technology and Innovation Management put more emphasizes on the professional knowledge of hi-tech and related industries.
