description.zh: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

description.zh: 本課程以介紹複合動力車輛概念、設計、能量分析及最佳化控制為主，結合內燃機及馬達兩種複合動力之能量管理及配合道路狀況，教導學生熟識複合車輛動力系統。
description.en: This course presents fundamentals of Hybrid Electric Vehicles: HEV concepts and design, energy analysis, unified modeling approach, optimization and control.  The power consumption side of vehicles. Conventional power generation: IC engine overview, concepts of hybridization, general model of energy form and energy flows, on-board energy storage (fuels and batteries). Overview of electrochemical converters: motors, transmissions for HEVs, principles of fuel cells, HEV application. Principles of energy optimization in HEVs.

description.zh: 單自由度系統的自由及強制振動，多自由度統的自由及強制振動，自然頻率的計算與模態分析，連續體的振動，振動的控制，振動系統之數值分析方法，非線性振動及隨機振動
description.en: Topics include Free and Forced vibrations of single degree and multidegree of freedom systems, Determination of natural frequencies and mode shapes, Vibration of continuous systems, Vibration control, Numerical methods in vibration analysis, Nonlinear vibration and Random vibration.

description.zh: 噪音基礎，噪音分析實驗法，汽車噪音法規與標準，基本噪音控制程序，車輛噪音與噪音控制基本，引擎噪音與控制，車輛噪音源，車輛噪音與改良，心理聲學與最佳化
description.en: Fundamentals of Acoustics, Experimental Methods of Acoustic Analysis, Automotive Noise Legislation and Standards, Basic Noise Control Procedure, Basics of Vehicle Noise and Noise Control, Engine Noise and Its Control, Vehicle Noise Sources, Vehicle Noise and Its Refinement, Psychoacoustic Analysis and Optimizations.

description.zh: 石油地質組著重於石油探勘中長期的效益，以提高探勘成功率為宗旨，作先導性之研究，支援現場單位解決地層對比、岩相組織、有效孔隙的問題。盆地分析、石油系統的研究、加強礦區經濟分析，提供探勘策略，促使降低探勘風險。
description.en: Principles of origin, migration, and accumulation of oil and gas. The laboratory introduces the procedures used for exploration, and development of hydrocarbon resources.

description.zh: 專題演講或書報討論
description.en: In this course, we will invite speakers from the academia, industry and government to lectures on topics in computer science and information engineering.

description.zh: 本課程探討處理空間資料的模式與演算法則，主題包含: (1) 空間資料庫介紹與應用, (2) 空間概念與資料模式, (3) 空間搜尋語言, (4) 空間資料儲存與索引, (5) 搜尋處理與最佳化, (6) 空間網路, (7) 空間資料庫的研究趨勢。
description.en: This course studies the models and algorithms for the efficient handling of data related to space. The topics include: (1) Introduction to Spatial Databases, (2) Spatial Concepts and Data Models, (3) Spatial Query Languages, (4) Spatial Storage and Indexing, (5) Query Processing and Optimization, (6) Spatial Networks, and (7) Trends on Spatial Databases.

description.zh: 網路搜尋已經成為最受歡迎的應用之一. 資訊檢索主要在探討如何有效的在大量文字及多媒體文件中搜尋使用者想要的資訊. 本課程將介紹資訊檢索的基本觀念, 檢索模型, 文字資訊檢索, 檢索結果評估, 索引與搜尋, 以及其他多媒體檢索相關應用
description.en: With the expansion of the World Wide Web (WWW), Web search has become one of the most popular applications. Information retrieval (IR) is a research field that targets at effectively and efficiently searching information in huge amounts of text and multimedia documents. In this course, we will introduce the basic models, text IR, retrieval evaluation, indexing and searching, and applications for IR.Outline:1. Overview of Information Retrieval2. Modeling3. Retrieval Evaluation4. Text IR5. Query Languages and Operations6. Indexing and Searching7. Applications for IR8. Web Search

notes: 四資四.電資國際班和資工所合開

description.zh: 電腦圖學在日常生活中已經是一個不可或缺的科技，其重要性已是不可言喻，然而數位網格在電腦圖學裡更是相當重要的一環，舉凡貼圖、動畫、網格變形…等，都必須利用到網格來建構。因此本課程宗旨為教導學生，如何利用c++程式來建構及控制數位網格，讓學生了解基礎數位網格之應用，並期許能在此課程中，學會各種網格之編程技巧，進而發展出許多有趣的電腦應用。本課程將探討的主題包括: surface representation, Mesh Data structure, Differential Geometry, mesh smoothing,mesh parameterization, remeshing, mesh simplification and Approximation, mesh repair, mesh segmentation, deformation and morphing
description.en: Geometry processing, or mesh processing, is a fast-growing area of research that uses concepts from applied mathematics, computer science, and engineering to design efficient algorithms for the acquisition, reconstruction, analysis, manipulation, simulation, and transmission of complex 3D models. This course discusses the whole geometry processing pipeline based on triangle meshes, provides a comprehensive introduction to mesh processing, including their design, analysis, and implementation. We will focus on the challenges of processing polygonal meshes. In particular, we will look at different data-structures for representing meshes, we will review some essential topics in differential geometry.Topics include:    ‧surface representation   ‧Mesh Data structure   ‧Differential Geometry   ‧mesh smoothing   ‧mesh parameterization   ‧remeshing   ‧mesh simplification and Approximation   ‧mesh repair

name.en: Special Topics on Nano- Technology and Environment

description.zh: 這門課著重在探討奈米科技之基本原理與應用範疇，以及環境應用與安全相關主題，內容包含奈米之基本特性、各種量測方法、結構控制、以及"納米"對環境應用與安全問題。此外並包含奈米微粒之產生、收集、測量以及微粒動力學等主題。
description.en: This course will investigate the definition and theories of nanotechnology. Including basic properties, measuring methods, structural control, environmental, and safety issues of "Nano-". Topics about generation, collection, measurement and dynamics of nano-particle will also be covered.

description.zh: 本課程以各種生動活潑的教學法，介紹學習科學概念、科學知識與科學基礎科目的學習理論與方法，並配合實際的案例及活動設計讓學生親身體會並實踐學習理論。
description.en: A large number of active teaching method is applied to this course by introducing the leaning theory and method for a general idea of leaning science, the knowledge of science and the core subject of science, moreover, to harmony with the actual cases and the creative activities in order to make the students realize and practice the learning theory in person.

description.zh: 在現今全球化競爭環境中，本課程提供對於產銷系統的充分理解，同時，藉由當代全球化國際產業環境之介紹，旨在於使學生理解營收管理之運作機制與效益。課程目標在使學生具備 (1) 在特殊產業中能辨認驅動需求相關因素之能力 (2) 計算價量關係並使利潤最佳化之能力 (3) 營收管理實際運用及必要之知識。
description.en: The course is to develop an appreciation for the importance of intermodal production and distribution systems to both individual organizations and global business in general. It exposes students to the real world of global supply chain system and revenue management by identifying current issues in intermodal integration of the production and distribution systems. After taking the class, the students will (a) be able to list and relate demand drivers to demands in specific industries, (b) be able to derive and compute price-demand relationship, optimal prices and revenues, (c) be aware of revenue management practices.

description.zh: 本課程介紹應用於醫療器材、人工器官、組織工程以及藥物釋放的相關材料。醫療器材主要包含骨科器材、人工關節、生物晶片、材料表面處理。人工器官包含人工軟骨、人工血管、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。組織工程包含支架材料、生物可分解性材料、生物反應器。藥物釋放包含高分子薄膜及目標型藥物傳送等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to illustrate the concepts about medical devices, artificial organs, tissue engineering and drug release technologies. The fundamentals of biomaterials will be introduced including materials, surface treatment, biological interactions, mechanical properties.

description.zh: 課程內容包高等控制策略，多變數控制系統，數位取樣，數位控制系統，模式識別，狀態變數。
description.en: An introduction to advanced control algorithms, multivariable process control, digital sampling, digital control system, model identifications, state variable.

description.zh: 本課程介紹高分子結構與其特性之關係，內容包括分子量、分子組成及結構、溶液特性、相變化、自組裝性質、彈性行為、粘彈性、動態機械性質、光學、電學和光電特性。
description.en: This course is an introduction to the relationship between polymer structure and properties: focusing on the molecular conformation and configuration, solution and phase behavior, rubber elasticity, viscoelasticity, dynamic mechanical behavior, optic, electronic and optoelectronic properties.

description.zh: 本課程將教授質譜、紅外線光譜、核磁共振光譜及紫外線光譜等所提供的互補資料來鑑定有機化合物的結構。除了光譜的解釋之外，也會教授基本的分析原理。
description.en: This course will teach students how to identify the structures of organic compounds from the complementary information afforded by the types of spectra: mass, infrared (IR), nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR), and ultraviolet (UV). The course is not only to teach students to interpret spectra, but also to present basic theoretical concepts.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: (1)	化學平衡: 包括物質本性, 化學熱力學, 化學平衡及平衡電化學。(2)	化學變化: 包括化學反應速率與動力學, 分子反應動力學, 表面反應及動態電化學。(3)	化學物質的結構與光譜學。
description.en: (1) Introduction to chemical equilibrium, including properties of matter, fundamentals of chemical thermodynamics, chemical equilibrium, and equilibrium electrochemistry.(2) Introduction to chemical change, including the rates and kinetics of chemical reactions, the molecular reactions dynamics, the properties of surface reactions, and dynamic electrochemistry.(3) Introduction to structure and spectroscopy of chemical compounds.

name.en: Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage

description.zh: 我國古蹟與歷史建築之文化遺產防災計畫實施現況，至今因欠缺有系統之調查研究，因此難以了解問題點所在。此外台灣現有之古蹟與歷史建築多為日治時期所遺留下來，而日本至今已有相當多具有良好防災計畫之古蹟與歷史建築案例，應可作為我國相關研究參考，但國內對此課題亦缺少有系統之調查。本課程的授課內容如下：1.概論 2.文化遺產防災之重要性3.文化遺產防災之基本策略4. 文化遺產防災之進行方式5.文化遺產之災害種類與對策。
description.en: Due to the lack of systematic research work carried out in Taiwan, it is difficult to find out the problems of the current disaster prevention plans for the cultural heritage. Taiwan has many existing vestiges and relics from Japanese colonial period at the moment. Despite the fact that there are numerous excellent examples of disaster prevention plans in Japan for us to consult and to research, little systematic work regarded the subject can be found in the literature in our own country. The course content about followings: 1. Introduction2. Importance of disaster prevention of cultural heritage3. Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage 4. Approach of disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage5. Type of cultural heritage disaster and guideline

name.zh: 城市災害管理與重建專題
name.en: Special Topics on Urban Disaster Management and Reconstruction

description.zh: 近來全球氣候異常變遷，對人類生活環境影響甚鉅；臺灣是天然災害發生最頻繁的地區，建築與規劃專業人員必需及早養成以規劃設計達到減災防災的災害防救意識與專業素養。本課程目的在強化建築與都市規劃專業對環境變遷與災害防治融入規劃設計知識與應變的能力；藉由國內外文獻探討、個案研究、課程研討與專家座談等方法，以區域生命共同體觀點，針對建築及都市規劃災害管理相關的災害種攞、減災型態的建築計畫與土地使用規劃、災害防救體系、環境變遷及衍生議題、資源配置、複合型災害衝擊、因應氣候變遷之災害調適策略與機制、災後安置、產業復甦與社區重建等有深入的探討，期能藉助設計與規劃保障生命財產安全。
description.en: A huge impact on the human environment occurred by the recent abnormal global climate change. Taiwan locates in one of the most frequent natural disasters areas, architectural and planning professionals are required to develop the disaster prevention and rescue knowledge and profession as soon as possible. The course aims to enhance the ability of architecture and urban planning profession, and understand how environmental change and disaster prevention can be integrated into the planning and design knowledge and training. With the perspective of regional life community to explore disaster management and reconstruction, disaster mitigation of architecture and land use planning, disaster prevention rescue system, environmental changes and derivative issues, resource allocation, compound disaster impact and response to climate changes of the adaptation strategies and mechanism, post-disaster resettlement, industrial recovery and community reconstruction through domestic and international

description.zh: 為追求「永續發展與人本健康」之目的，使既有與新建的居住環境，配合我國「室內空氣品質管理法」規範下運作，提昇民眾居住環境健康品質效益，針對病態建築之環境問題，其涵蓋醫療、法律、建築、化學、生物等領域，綜合診斷以進行改善。本課程為第二階段之系列課程，其內容包括：一.孼疫學：探討關於病態建築症候群的因素與特定外來的致病物質與孼疫之關聯。二.家政事務：探討生活習慣、飲食生活的變化對環境、人體健康之影響。三.醫療領域：探討病態建築症候群與化學物質過敏症的差異與因應對策。四.日常領域：探討日常生活用品、居住行為對環境、人體健康之影響。
description.en: The main goal of this class is to pursue sustainable development and human health. In order to enhance the quality of residential and living environment in both existing and new-build dwellings, the course will cover important principles and topics in sick building environment, including medical, regulation, and architecture, chemical and biological. Specific contents include:(1)Immunology: to introduce the interactions between the immune system and the factors of sick building syndrome (SBS) and some specific pathogens.(2)Behavioral science: to investigate the influence of dietary and habit changes on environmental and human health.(3)Medical care: to introduce the difference and the response strategies between sick building syndrome (SBS) and Multiple Chemical Sensitivity (MCS)(4)Daily life: to investigate the influence of daily articles and resident behavior on environmental and human health.

notes: 建都所和設計博合班上課

description.zh: 本課程主要進行「永續建築環境」之相關研究議題探討與分析。於瞬息萬變之環境與極富思維空間之建築研究中並不能全然按理論或法則定律判斷，亦須依實務經驗輔以基礎理論架構予以綜合評估與分析評估。探討之內容包括但不限下面之主題：『永續建築環境規劃設計』、『永續建築環境教育』和『永續能源環境規劃設計』等相關議題間之相互依存性或相關性，藉由國內外之相關案例進行深入探討與分析，期待建立個人對現今永續建築環境之瞭解與認識。
description.en: The theme of the course is "Sustainable Architecture". It aims to provide a forum to examine and discuss solution-oriented methods for implementing sustainable development, and to stimulate more ideas and useful insights regarding architecture development within the context of sustainability. In an effort to explore and map the challenges and opportunities of sustainable development, this course aims to address the various aspects of architecture & urban development in accordance with the principles of sustainability. These themes will address issues but not limit to, architectural design, ecological and social sustainability, economic and environmental sustainability, environmentalism.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討界面的物理化學現象及其在高科技之應用。包括有(1) 表面及界面張力的分子理論(2)界面的作用力(3)表面及界面的熱力學(4)液體和固體界面的熱力學(5)表面及界面張力的測量(6)接觸角的測量(7)吸附的熱力學(8)分散液的穩定性(9)分散液分子間吸力及斥力(10)懸浮液之高分子穩定性(11)凝聚(12)界面科學在高科技及光電工業上之原理及應用。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the interfacial phenomena and its application in high-tech Industries. It includes (1)molecular theory of surface and interface (2)molecular interaction of interface (3)thermodynamics of surface and interfaces (4)thermodynamics of liquids in contact with solids (5)measurement of surface and interfacial tension (6)contact angle measurement (7)thermodynamics of adsorption (8)stability of dispersion (9)molecular interaction of dispersion (10)stability of suspension (11)flocculation(12)application of interface science in High-tech industries

description.zh: 專題討論本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 專題討論本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 為涵養水量、維護水質以及保育水土資源，對於集水區內土地的使用，應有適當的規劃與管理牽涉的問題，一般以水資源利用、水質控制、管理計畫等課題加以涵括。因此本課程包含水資源情勢分析、水利法規、水權管理、點源及非點源污染管理、地下水規劃與管理、民眾參與及生態工法於集水區治理工程之應用等，俾提供適度發展及兼顧自然生態機能的集水區社區總體生活，達成「水、土、林、人」四贏之水資源保育總體目標。
description.en: In order to preserve water quantity, to protect water quality, and to conserve soil and water resources, it is necessary to institute appropriate land use regulations in a watershed. In general, it is included water resources utilization, water quality control and management. Therefore the major topics are water resources tendency, water law, water right, point and non-point sources pollution control, ground water management, public participation, ecological working method, etc. With appropriate public participation, the government can work together with people in community development in a manner which will enrich local cultural characteristics, and provide ideas for a sustainable growth, which would lead to a high quality of life and also would protect the watershed's ecology . The ultimate goal of making these efforts is to achieve a " water-soil-trees-men ", four-win situation.

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

name.en: Special Topics of Instrumental Analytical Chemistry

description.zh: 由量子化學及結晶化學等理論為基礎，討論一些分析儀器的原理，構造及應用。特別是原子光譜法，電化學分析法及離子層析儀及質譜儀等，針對無機物之分析方法。
description.en: Considering the theories of quantum and crystal chemistry, discuss the theories, structure and applications of some instruments.  Those are used for chemical analysis, especially for inorganic materials: atomic spectroscopy, electrochemical analysis methods, ion-exchange chromatography and mass spectroscopy.

description.zh: 此課程旨在以人為本，研究互動系統之設計與評估。使學生了解人類認知過程之理論與模式以及其工作與環境之特性，並使學生能應用設計程序與評估方法來提升系統之績效。
description.en: This course focuses on the design and evaluation of interactive systems from a human centric perspective. Students will learn about the theories and models of human cognitive processing with the consideration of task and enviroment characteristics; and students will learn how to apply design processes and evaluation techniques for improving system performance.

description.zh: 介紹人體生物力學及肌肉骨骼等組織之特性，以及應用於工作場所相關之生物力學知識，以評估工具效益、肌肉骨骼負荷及肌肉骨骼傷害風險。課程內容包括肌肉骨骼系統的組成與結構、人體計測資料與應用、靜態人體生物力學模型、NIOSH抬舉公式、動態生物力學模型與量測設備、手工具設計與生物力學電腦模擬。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to introduce the mechanical behavior and its application of the musculoskeletal system and component tissues when physical work is performed. The lectures cover：anatomy/strength of biomaterials/muscle physiology, anthropometry, spine biomechanics, static biomechanical models and NIOSH lifting equation, bioinstrumentation and dynamic biomechanical models, hand tool design, and computer simulation of biomechanics.

name.zh: X光在材料分析上的應用

description.zh: X光已經成為材料結構鑑定上一項很有用的技術。這門課將介紹如何應用X光粉末繞射與吸收光譜於材料結構鑑定，以及數據分析。
description.en: X-ray has become a powerful technique on the characterization of material structures. The course will teach how to apply the x-ray diffraction and absorption on structural characterization and even analysis.

name.zh: 第二語言習得專題討論

description.zh: 本課程將對第二語言習得的主要議題進行深入地探討論與分析。上課的內容包括，但不限於，下列主題: 語言天賦、跨語言影響、人格特質、學習動機、學習風格、學習策略、外語焦慮和外語學習信念等。
description.en: This course is designed to engage students in intensive study and analysis of selected issues and problems in second language acquisition. The topics covered in this course include, but are not limited to, the following: language aptitude, cross-linguistic influences, personality, motivation, leaning styles, learning strategies, language anxiety, and learners' beliefs.

description.zh: 詞彙學討論語言的約定俗成模式，(經常通過語料庫查詢方法) 發現無所不在的固定/習慣性表達以及妥貼的字詞搭配方式，是適當理解與運用自然語言的關鍵。經由此課程，學生將獲得包含詞彙/片語單位及其意義聯想、指認、使用情境的各種知識層面。
description.en: Phraseology addresses the conventional patterns of language use, such as the pervasiveness of formulaic/idiomatic expressions and appropriate collocations (often through the use of corpus-based methods). It is key to the proper interpretation and production of a language in its natural use. Through this course, students are expected to acquire facets of knowledge including lexical/phraseological units and their meaning associations, identifications, and situations of use.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生創作能力，寫作文類包括詩、小說和戲劇，乃至任何別出心裁的新類型，如以非小說類型呈現的多媒體創作。學生經由本課程所學的教巧訓練和寫作策略的運用，不但將具備寫作的能力和深度，更可直接將此能力學以致用，發揮在專業寫作上，包括新聞、設計、廣告以及藝術管理行政。
description.en: Students in this course obtain practical experience writing poetry, fiction and drama, as well as in working with the newly emergent creative writing genres of creative non-fiction and multi-media performance.  The skills, techniques and strategies learned in this class will not only help students realize their own abilities and insights as writers, but are directly applicable to wide range of professions, including journalism, design, advertising and arts organization administration.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討下列議題:文學與藝術的創作和女性自覺有什麼樣的關係?在現代社會,文學與藝術作品的創作與欣賞對女性又具有何種特別的意義?為追索答案,本課程引領學生探訪自十九世紀末期到今日在文藝界的女性翹楚,賞析她們在各自領域的獨特成就,並探究她?的天賦秉性與所置身之社會文化之互動關係.涵蓋的領域包括:詩,(短篇)小說,戲劇(舞台與電影劇本),散文,攝影,電影,繪畫,建築設計等當今文化重要面向.
description.en: The aim of this course is to guide students toward a panoramic view and in-depth understanding of women's creativity at its highest level of achievement in the realms of British/American literature and the modern arts since the late nineteenth century.  We will study the most representative works by women writers in each of the following literary genres: poetry, short stories, novels, drama (and screenplays), and essays. We will also explore masterpieces of artworks by female artists in the following fields: film, photography, paintings and architectural designs. Students will be asked to explore the correlation among the significance of the writer/artist's works, the cultural background she is/was situated, and the individual talents and temperament of the writer/artist herself. The purpose of these investigations is to answer the following questions:  What do literature and art have to do with femininity in the modern world? What do literature and art mean to women?

name.zh: 譯學新趨勢與翻譯實踐
name.en: New Trends in Translation Studies and Translation Practice

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹20世紀90年代之後翻譯研究興起的「全球化轉向」與「社會學轉向」兩大新趨勢，並深入探討其對翻譯實踐與譯者專業素養所可能帶來的啟示。課程欲含括之翻譯議題如下：（1）全球化轉向-全球化與本土化張力、跨文化溝通、文化認同、權力關係、譯者中介、科技與翻譯、翻譯商品化、非專業翻譯；（2）社會學轉向-翻譯的社會因素（如社會制約與機制）、譯者的社會層面（如譯者角色、慣習與網絡）、翻譯過程的社會學研究（如品質管控、編修與團隊翻譯）。除論文之研讀外，亦將透過翻譯實例的分析（包括新聞、字幕、旅遊、廣告、網頁、商業與文學翻譯等實例），讓學生明瞭這些新趨勢如何引導翻譯實踐，並使其重新省思譯者的專業素養。此外，英漢/漢英翻譯實作與譯評亦為授課重點，期藉此協助學生與時並進，構思適切的翻譯策略。
description.en: This course aims to introduce the "globalization turn" and "sociological turn" in translation studies after the 1990s. An exploration will also be made into their possible implications for translation practice and the translator's qualifications. Translation issues to be addressed may include the following: (1) the globalization turn - the tension between globalization and localization, cross-cultural communication, cultural identity, power relations, the translator's mediation, technology and translation, the commoditization of translation services and non-professional translation (such as fansubbing and scanlation); (2) the sociological turn - socio factors of translation (e.g. social constraints and mechanisms), social aspects of the translator's profession (e.g. the translator's role, habitus and network), and the sociology of the translating process (e.g. quality control, revision and team translation). Through concrete examples of authentic translations, this course will enable s

description.zh: 講述有關低溫電漿的特徵、性能及有機高分子纖維、生醫素材方面的應用。因高分子表面的改質，使濕潤性、接著性、染色性、帶電性、印刷性等獲致改善，附與高機能功能性。並針對處理時的條件，包括氣體的種類、真空度、壓力、功率、時間、流量等因素，探討對高分子素材表面改質的影響和效果。配合SEM、ESCA、接觸角等儀器的分析、觀測高分子表面構造的變化及成分的變異，以研究高分子表面的改質。
description.en: Lecture for the characteristic of low temperature plasma. as  well as its application in organic polymer fiber and biomedical material. The submicron modification of polymer surface can improve wettibility, adhesion, dyeing behavior, electrification, and printing properties for endow material with high performance. Explain for the plasma treating conditions, such as gas  variety、vacuum、 pressure、power、 time、 flow rate etc., are also discussed in order to study their influence and effect in Polymer Material surface modification. The surface structure and component change are analyzed by SEM, ESCA and contact angle instruments to investigate the modification on polymer surface.

description.zh: 本課程著重於教授現代有機合成方法、反應機構、及其應用等知識，並幫助學生了解有機化學與生物化學、藥學等領域之相關性，進而拓展到將來學術及工業上的研究與應用。
description.en: This course focuses the contemporary developments in the study of the structure of carbon compounds and the mechanism of their reactions. Selected topics such as natural product, heterocyclic compound, stereochemistry, aromaticity, reaction intermediates, peptides synthesis and photochemistry will be included.

description.zh: 基本熱傳機構，穩態與非穩態熱傳導其包括有內部熱源之系統。內部及外部之強制及自然對流。表面及氣體間之輻射。利用因次方法及邊界層來考量熱傳。
description.en: Basic heat transfers mechanisms. Steady and unsteady conduction, including system with internal heat sources. Internal and external forced and free convection. Radiation between surfaces and in gases. Dimensional and boundary layer consideration.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生瞭解各類化工程序模式的建立以及其求解的方法。內容包括：輸送動態方程式之建立，線性、非線性、矩陣、微分方程等之轉換及求解。
description.en: The goal of process simulation is to develop numerical analysis techniques that allow students to simulate the behavior of a chemical process. The contents involving：the development of dynamic equations of transport, the transformations and solutions of linear, nonlinear matrix, and differential equations.

description.zh: 本課程介紹近代電化學的分析方法。 介紹內容包含電位法、循環伏安法、安培法、光譜電化學法、旋轉環碟電極法、及其他近代電化學的分析方法。
description.en: Introduction the principles and applications of modern electroanalytical methods. Introduction the theory and application of polarography, potentiometry, cyclic voltammetry, Amperometry, spectroelectrochemistry, RRDE, and other modern electroanalytical techniques.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程將結合生物技術與化工原理來進行微生物、動、植物細胞之培養、酵素之提取、反應動力學、生物反應器的操作與相關參考數之獲取法、產品之分離程序等。
description.en: In combination of biotechnology and chemical engineering to learn cell incubation, enzyme purification, bioreactor operation, and product separation, etc.

name.en: Human Computer Interaction on media convergence Platform

description.zh: 本課程將提供學生如何學習整合手持行動裝置以及電腦視覺技術，利用電腦視覺技術，進行影像擷取，並分析影像中所表示之操作指令，並將分析結果轉換為電腦操作指令，已達到人機互動之功效，並整合實現於一套手持行動裝置平台上，除了讓學生可學習電腦視覺技術，也藉由手持行動裝置來實現之途徑，學習到軟硬體整合之經驗。
description.en: The objective of this course is to teach students design methodologies, developing tools, and implementation on media converged platform (handheld devices) for human-computer interaction applications. The topics include: 1. Introduce system development platform and tool-chains on handheld devices. 2. Developing software using opensource GUI and computer vision libraries. 3. Developing Vision-based techniques for intelligent human-computer interaction on handheld devices . 4. Developing augmented reality applications on handheld devices

notes: 四資四和資工所合開,周二第6節在系教室上課

description.zh: 在重製呈現的架構下，空間理論包含真實空間如何被感知與認知，如何於媒材上呈現為圖像空間，以及如何在媒材上的圖像空間去描述一未來(現在、或過去) 存在的真實空間。本課程藉由平行檢視視覺心理學的空間理論與其相關的近代數位應用，以數位影像媒材的角度來重新探討空間理論，並用以發展可能的研究主題。
description.en: The aim of this course is to examine the interrelations between space, media, and media space from a computational point of view. Weekly seminar focuses on the review of theories of space, conventional and computational representation, and methods that underlie the research applications relate to media and media space.

description.zh: 服務設計的方法乃是透過相關資源做適當的規劃與組織，已提昇使用者與服務提供者間之服務及互動的品質。其主要的架構與方法乃在於了解使用者的行為、需求及動機後，創造具友善性、競爭性、及相關性的使用者經驗。本課程將以服務設計的概念與方法為核心，以使用者需求及經驗的創造為基礎，探討並分析不同的互動技術的適用情境及其發展與應用領域。
description.en: Service design is the activity of planning and organizing related resources of service in order to improve its quality and the interaction between service provider and users. The backbone of service design methodologies is to understand the behavior of the users, their needs and motivations, so that to create user-friendly, competitive and relevant service to the users. The service design concepts and methodologies and user experience analysis are used in this course for discussing the developments and applications of interactive technologies in the aspects of various scenarios and application fields.

notes: 教室將依選修人數再做調整,互動所和資工所合開

description.zh: 現代能源工程技術，決定製程成本，故如何統合有效率的能源管理技術是決定產品競爭力之關鍵，本課程主要內容為︰1. 能源成本控制2. 區域型電力能管理策略3. 能源系統的經濟性設計概念4. 冷暖系統的檢測與分析5. 總合能源操作的工程化資料收集6. 新能源系統的生態模組化設計
description.en: At the completion of this course, students will be able to several factors:1. Compare and contrast the various forms of energy conversion.2. Examine the technologies used to convert chemical energy into mechanical energy.3. Apply the concepts of electrical converters.4. Evaluate the major types of energy storage.5. Determine how human values affect the success of energy conservation.6. Design of new energy system modules with ecology considerations.

description.zh: 本課程為研究所熱流科學基礎課程之一，內容主要包括質量、動量與能量守恆方程式的推導，以及它們的解析與近似解，應用範圍包含非旋轉流、低雷諾數流以及高雷諾數(邊界層)流等等。
description.en: This course is one of the fundamental courses in the thermofluid sciences for graduate students. Based upon the concept of conservation, the equations of mass, momentum, and energy will be derived. This course will deal with solutions of these equations, both exact and approximate. The application of solutions includes irrotational flow, low Reynolds number flow, and high Reynolds number (boundary layer) flow, etc.

description.zh: 透過理論及實務配合講解，並輔以實例觀察，課程以能源經濟理論為講授架構，講解能源經濟之特性及型態，並介紹我國能源政策訂訂原則及內涵，以使學生能對能源產業及能源政策有整體性瞭解，讓學生得以學以應用，為以後升學、就業或進入政府部門服務奠下良好基礎。
description.en: This course is to teach the theory of energy economic and strategy. Through the lecture of theory and real case study, students can learn the characteristics and type of energy industry and the principles and contents of energy strategy. Students can understand the energy market and energy strategy for studying in the graduate school, entering companies, and servicing for the government department.

description.zh: 控制理論基礎，冷凍控制系統方式簡介，冷凍系統控制元件認識，冷凍循環運轉控制系統規劃，冷凍應用環境溫溼度及污染控制，除霜、防溼及防凍控制設計，冷凍應用節能控制系統規劃設計
description.en: Fundamentals of control logic, introduction to refrigerating control methods, controlled devices and controllers, control circuit design for refrigerating cycle operating, schematic design of space temperature, humidity and contaminants control, Defrost, frost and moisture control design, energy saving control system design

description.zh: 熱交換器設計方法、單向對流熱傳計算、壓差計算、冷凝器與蒸發器分析、殼管式熱交換器分析、密集式熱交換器分析、濕盤管理論分析
description.en: Design methods, forced convection correlations for single phase heat exchange, pressure calculation, condensers and evaporators analysis, shell and tube heat exchanger analysis, compact heat exchanger analysis, wet coil analysis.

description.zh: 1.無線傳輸技術之效能評估2.GSM系統之分析與模擬3.IS-95 CDMA系統之分析與模擬4.第三代行動通訊系統之分析與模擬5.定位機制之探討6.統計通道模擬7.定點通道模擬
description.en: 1.Performance Evaluation of Wireless Transmission Techniques2.Analysis and Simulation of GSM System3.Analysis and Simulation of IS-95 CDMA System4.Analysis and Simulation of 3G Systems5.Positioning6.Statistic Channel Modeling 7.Sight Specific Channel modeling

description.zh: 1. 基礎	1.1 使用者之特性	1.2 電腦之特性	1.3 人機互動2. 設計	2.1 可用性之原理	2.2 設計程序	2.3 使用者之模式	2.4 工作分析	2.5 對話記號及設計	2.6 系統模式	2.7 實作工具及支援	2.8 評估技術	2.9 線上協助及文件3. 進階課題	3.1 群體工作軟體	3.2 CSCW 課題及理論	3.3 多重感測系統
description.en: 1. Foundations	1.1 The human	1.2 The computer	1.3 The interaction2. Design Practice	2.1 Usability paradigms and principles	2.2 The design process	2.3 Models of the user in design	2.4 Task analysis	2.5 Dialogue notations and design	2.6 Models of the system	2.7 Implementation support	2.8 Evaluation techniques	2.9 Online help and documentation3. Advanced Topics	3.1 Groupware	3.2 CSCW issues and theory	3.3 Multi-sensory systems

description.zh: 此門課程的主要目標，將介紹數位多媒體晶片設計，讓學生對於數位多媒體晶片設計有深入的認識與了解，進而產生濃厚的興趣與設計能力。
description.en: This course covers theoretical foundations and applications in digital multimedia IC design. The outline of this course is given as follows. 1. Introduction 2. Digital IC Design3. Color Science4. Multimedia System   a. Image and Video Coding  b. State-of-the-art Image and Video Coding Standards (industry)  c. 3D Video System  d. Holographic System5. Multimedia IC Design Methodology

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於提供生醫晶片之基本知識 ，及生醫晶片電路設計之設計方法。課程內容首先介紹生醫晶片的發展現況，及如何利用微機電製程及CMOS相容製程來感測生醫訊號，接著介紹用來處理生醫訊號的前段類比電路，及之後數位類比轉換電路。最後再介紹如何利用無線電路及可植入式的介面作訊號之傳遞，而形成一完整之生醫晶片電路。
description.en: The object of Bio-Medical Circuit Design is to introduce the basic Bio-Medical knowledge and train students design the Bio-Medical circuit. The course will first introduce the development of the Bio-Medical chip and MEMs process. It also includes Low Noise Analog Front-End Circuit, ADC, Implantable interface circuit and Low Power Wireless Circuit design.

description.zh: 噪音基礎，噪音分析實驗法，汽車噪音法規與標準，基本噪音控制程序，車輛噪音與噪音控制基本，引擎噪音與控制，車輛噪音源，車輛噪音與改良，心理聲學與最佳化
description.en: Fundamentals of Acoustics, Experimental Methods of Acoustic Analysis, Automotive Noise Legislation and Standards, Basic Noise Control Procedure, Basics of Vehicle Noise and Noise Control, Engine Noise and Its Control, Vehicle Noise Sources, Vehicle Noise and Its Refinement, Psychoacoustic Analysis and Optimizations.

description.zh: 首先介紹我國及美日等國的防災體制、組織權責、運作機制，並比較其優缺點。接著討論防災資訊、通訊及新興科技在災害防球上的應用。介紹各類天然及人為災害的理論及特性，如地震、颱風、淹水、坡地災害、土石流、施工災害、環境污染、工業災害、全球氣候變遷等。從減災、整備、應變、復原重建四個時序來探討防災計畫緊急應變計畫標準作業程序的內容與要點。
description.en: This course first introduces the disaster prevention systems,jurisdiction and responsibility, and operation mechanism of several countries including Taiwan,Japan and the  United States of America. The application of computer information, communication and advanced technologies for disaster prevention will also be discussed. The characteristics of various natural and man-made disasters, such as earthquakes, typhoons, floods, slope failures, debris flows, contruction incidents, environmental pollution, industrial hazards, and global weather changing will be introduced. The major contents of disaster prevention plans, emergency response plans and standard operation procedures will e discussed corresponding to the disaster mitigation, preparedness, response and recovery.

description.zh: 本課程係提供防火工程有關基礎概論、設計工學手法及實務技術等理論與應用兼重的課程，以促進學生自立研討學習能力，提高教學良性互動關係，可供職場工程實務相關防火工程之重要技能與知識。內容包括：一、現行防火安全法規與性能式防火法規二、性能式防火設計基礎概論三、防止起火及火災成長有關技術四、火災探測與滅火有關技術五、控制室內外延燒擴大有關技術六、避難疏散與逃生有關技術七、煙氣控制有關技術八、構造耐火設計有關技術
description.en: The purpose of course is to provide the fundamental theory and practical technique about the fire protection engineering, encourage the establishment of self-learning ability of students and facilitate their skill and knowledge about fire protection engineering in construction job. The course covers the following subjects:1.fire safety related regulation and performance-based code in force2.fundamental theory for performance-based design3.prevention techniques about fire initiation and growth4.techniques of fire detection and extinguishment5.control techniques about interior and exterior flame-spread6.means of evacuation and escape7.techniques of smoke control8.techniques about fire resistance design of structure

name.zh: 模糊理論在災害管理之應用
name.en: Application of Fuzzy Theory in Disaster Management

description.zh: 模糊理論基本觀念模糊數學模糊多屬性決策分析應用實例分析
description.en: The course introduces fuzzy theory and related models to improve the effectiveness of disaster management. The main content includes concepts of logic, fuzzy set, fuzzy relation, fuzzy math, fuzzy logic, calculation principles, and some important performance evaluation methods and application algorithms which are often used with fuzzy theory. The course may help students not only touching the key concepts of fuzzy theory, but also independently doing deeper research in fuzzy, evaluation, and management field.

description.zh: 本課程主要係研討調查方法、穩定分析、坡地災害成因、坡地監測、防災及管理配套措施、以使同學了解山坡地工程於規劃設計及施工等階段，應如何進行減少災害和實行適當管理。
description.en: This course will focus on the site investigation ,stability analysis ,failure analysis ,in-situ monitoring ,disaster prevention  ,and risk management of natural slopes. It is designed to give students a better understanding of slope protection and slope management during various stages（such as planning，design and construction）of the slope development.

description.zh: 1. 數位通訊系統簡介2. 隨機程序3. 數位調變與多工技術4. 最佳接收器5. 載波與符碼同步6. 消息理論7. 訊源編碼8. 通道編碼9. 展頻通訊系統10. 行動通訊系統
description.en: 1. Introduction 2. Random Processes3. Digital Modulation and Multiplexing4. Optimal Receiver5. Carrier and Symbol Synchronization6. Information Theory7. Source Coding 8. Channel Coding9. Spread Spectrum Systems10. Mobile Communication Systems

description.zh: 1. 電力系統品質項目與定義2. 電壓降與停電3. 電壓不平衡4. 電力諧波5. 頻率變動6. 電壓閃爍7. 暫態過壓8. 電力品質監控
description.en: 1. Terms and definitions of power systems quality2. Voltage sags and interruption3. Voltage unbalance4. Power harmonics5. Frequency deviation6. Voltage flicker7. Transient overvoltages8. Monitoring of power quality

description.zh: 1.光的電磁理論回顧2.光學系統光束追跡3.高斯光學4.共振腔理論5. 原子輻射6.雷射振盪與放大7.雷射種類與應用
description.en: 1.Review of Electromagnetic Theory2.Ray Tracing in Optical System3.Gaussian Beams in Optical Media4.Optical Resonator and Cavity Theory5.Atomic Radiation6.Laser Oscillation, Amplification, and Excitation7.Laser Characteristics, Category, and Applications

description.zh: 本課程主要了解行銷研究的本質與特性，掌握行銷研究要領，進而具備規劃與執行行銷研究的能力，包含下列：行銷研究的環境與基本觀念，網路資料庫介紹，資料蒐集模式與方法，問卷設計與抽樣，量表製作，資料分析，研究成果呈現與溝通。
description.en: This course aims to help participants understand the nature and features of marketing research, realize how to conduct marketing research, and develop a toolset for the planning and implementation of marketing research. It has the followings: Background of Marketing Research, Introduction to Marketing Research, Database and Data Collection: Types and Methods, Measurement Instruments and Sampling, Data Analysis, Communicating with Research Users.

name.zh: 嵌入式即時多工核心開發與應用
name.en: The Development and Application of Embedded Multitasking Real-time Kernel

description.zh: 本課程在使學生認識嵌入式即時多工核心，瞭解其架構，並學習嵌入式即時多工核心之設計與相關應用技術。內容包含：(1)嵌入式系統介紹，(2)即時多工系統觀念介紹，(3)即時多工核心運作方式，(4)工作管理，(5)時間管理，(6)記憶體管理，(7)事件管理，(8)於嵌入式系統建制即時多工核心。
description.en: This course let students to understand the embedded multitasking real-time kernel.  They will parse the structure of multitasking real-time kernel; learn the skill to design the embedded multitasking real-time kernel and the application technology.  The contents of this course are: (1)Embedded system introduction, (2)Multitasking real-time concept, (3)Kernel structure, (4)Task management, (5) Time management, (6)Memory management, (7) Event management, (8)Real-Time kernel porting.

description.zh: 熱傳學主要內容是研究由於溫度梯度所造成能量傳遞之一門學問﹐為一般冷凍、空調、食品冷藏及各類型熱交換器設計之基本知識程,其他大如各類發電廠，小如電腦微晶片散熱亦有密切關係。本課程之安排以奠定學生在熱傳方面之智能，作為未來進入冷凍、空調與能源相關學門之踏腳石。
description.en: 1.	熱傳導定律之推導2.	一維及多維的穩態與暫態熱傳分析，3.	散熱片之設計，利用數值方法解熱傳導問題，4.	對流原理之推導5.	強迫對流方面的分析及應用-層流邊界層，管道內層流熱傳6.	自然對流方面的分析及應用-管道外與封閉空間內自然對流        熱傳7.	紊流的基本性，紊流邊界層，管道內紊流8.	具相變化的熱對流:凝結與沸騰9.	熱交換器設計介紹Advanced Heat Transfer  Credit: 3 Course Outline1.	Derivation of heat conduction principles 2.	One and multi-dimentional steady and transient heat         conduction analysis3.	Heat transfer from extended surfaces, numerical heat         conduction analysis4.	Derivation of convection principles 5.	Forced convection - laminar boundary layers and     laminar heat transfer in ducts6.	Nature convection over external surfaces and in internal enclosures 7.	Fundamentals of turbulence, turbulent boundary layers, turbulent flow in ducts8.	Heat transfer with phase change: boiling and condensation9.	Introduction to heat-exchanger design

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文表達能力。
description.en: Objective of this course is to improve oral presentation ability.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

name.zh: 教育訓練實施與績效評鑑

description.zh: 為了使訓練資源的更有效運用，本課程希望讓學生了解，企業內部在實施訓練之前，應客觀、嚴謹的加以評估，並追蹤其實施後的成效，以正確評估訓練的效益。
description.en: To make better use of the training resources, the curriculum expects to make students understand that any enterprise should objectively and carefully evaluate the training program before its employment, and keep track of its effect after its employment to make sure the effectiveness of the training program.

name.en: The use of technology in teaching and learning

description.zh: 本課程將教授現行的科技教學工具如電子白板、按按按、電子書包等設計的學理基礎以及應用於教學中的特性及趨勢，並進一步講述如何融入於教學及學習。
description.en: The course is designed to explore how to apply technological tools effectively in the classroom. Concepts and strategies will be covered.

name.en: Special Topic on the Aesthetic of Architectural Construciton

description.zh: 在每個文明的進程中，會因為其環境風土條件與技術需求，發展出來其特有的建築營造系統，而在此營造系統中，又會因為建築空間文化形式、材料、審美等不同的內在或是外在的條件，進而發展出在建築的整體空間與構造細部上有不同的作法。本課程分別針對人類的建築歷史上重要的建築文明系統發展與其美學，從希臘時期、羅馬時期、哥德時期的石造建築技術，一直到十九世紀工業革命以後至廿世紀的鑄鐵、鋼鐵、鋼筋混凝土等現代建築發展過程中的建築構造，以材料特性與工法內容分別討論其形貌以及美學建構的內容。
description.en: In Human History, each civilization would develop its construction system, which might be influenced by the physic environment and the technics it requests. In similar or different construction systems, it would derive into different aspects and ways of combination in the spatial forms and constructive d?tails, due to the inner or outer conditions, such as different cultural forms, materials and aesthetics, etc. This seminar bases on the architectural history of different civilizations, from Greek, Roman, Gothic epochs, to the post industrial r?volution of the Nineteenth Century and Twentieth Century. We would like to study the aspect and aesthetic through the ancient architecture of mason construction to those modern or modernist architecture of different materials such as iron, steel, or reinforced concrete, etc.

class.name: 永續建築外國學生專班

description.zh: 介紹高動態範圍數位影像之理論基礎與相關技術。在光環境模擬與視覺空間感知兩架構下，介紹高動態範圍數位影像技術在建築照明實務與空間感知研究的應用。
description.en: Introduce the theories and techniques of High Dynamic Range Imaging. Weekly seminars focus on its applications in architectural lighting, and research applications in space perception.

class.name: 永續建築外國學生專班

description.zh: 本課程提供所有博士生共同參與研究討論的園地。將進行設計專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is a joint seminar for all the doctoral students, which will be progressed by paper presentation of special topics on design issues, giving lectures, and group meeting.

name.en: Advanced Study on Urban Disaster Management

description.zh: 台灣是全球最為脆弱地區之一，加以都市集約發展，每當災害發生，很容易造成人民生命財產嚴重損失。本課程目的在於加強同學應用災害管理、資源配置、實質規劃知識與應變能力於建築及都市規劃專業領域；藉由國內外文獻探討、個案研究、課程研討與專家座談等方法，針對災害種攞、防災與減災的建築計畫與土地使用規劃、災害防救體系、環境變遷及衍生議題、資源配置、複合型災害衝擊、因應氣候變遷之災害調適策略與機制、災後安置、產業復甦與社區重建等議題深入的探討，以培育高階設計與規劃管理人才。
description.en: Taiwan located in one of the world's most vulnerable areas with highly urban development, whenever disaster occurred; it is likely to cause serious economic and live losses. The course aims to strengthen students' applications of disaster management, resource allocation, physical planning knowledge and adaptability to architectural design and urban planning. Through the literatures review, case studies, seminar and discussion with experts, we would focus on the types of disasters, disaster prevention and disaster reduction of building plans and land-use planning, disaster prevention and response systems, environmental changes and derivative issues, resource allocation, compound disaster impact, adaptative strategies and mechanisms to climate change, post-disaster resettlement, industrial recovery and community reconstruction issues, in order to cultivate high-level design, planning and management talents.

name.zh: 德國設計研究與體驗(二)
name.en: Design Research and Experience in Germany (II)

description.zh: 赴德研習之進階課程；創新設計實務與文化相關之研究，以建立德國設計研究與體驗基礎。課程內容以調查研究德國設計相關設計資源﹐包含學校﹐設計展﹐博物館﹐文化及語言等內容。
description.en: This course provides research of design in Germany related topics on culture and Design. The course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and experiential verification.

name.zh: 電腦整合設計與製造研究
name.en: Study of Computer Integrated Design and Manufacturing

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹研究電腦整合設計與製造之軟體，並藉實例演練，以達熟悉研究電腦整合設計與製造之操作與功能。
description.en: To introduce and study the software of computer integrated design and manufacturing.  By the project practice, to be adept at the operation and function of computer integrated design and manufacturing.

description.zh: 講授設計相關學術研究的基本特質與科學方法的傳統。本課程之目標在於呈現各種研究方法的特質與限制，進而引導初學者以策略性的思考進行文獻探討並架構適當的設計研究策略，最後得以研擬具可行性的研究計劃。上述設計研究策略包括：文獻探討的方法與策略，蒐集研究資料的方法與策略，抽樣的效用與策略，及資料分析的策略等。
description.en: Lecture on theories of academic research and characteristic of science approaches in design research. This course aims to present learners with a variety of research methods and conduct individuals through the process of (1) strategic literature research, (2) constructing proper research strategies and finally (3) organize feasible research plans.

description.zh: 本課程係透過對文化之研究與解析，解構出具備設計發展之要素，並藉由設計專題之研討，實際應用文化意涵進行設計創作，發展出具創新之商品與服務，藉以培養學生對各種文化之解析能力，與設計應用之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on the deconstruction of design element through the study and analysis of culture. This course also focuses on the training of students’ ability of multiple-culture analysis and design application through the design topic seminar and cultural-meaning-applied design practice that develop innovative products and service.

description.zh: 家具設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved furniture design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

name.zh: 設計反思與設計創作實務

description.zh: 介紹反思在設計學習及設計活動之意義及其相關類別及方法, 課程中將進行個人及團隊式之設計創作實務演練及反思體驗, 以擴大設計經驗的學習成效，達成設計者的知識、態度和技能得以增加、調適或改變的成長目的。
description.en: Introduction to the meaning of design reflection to design learning and design practice. Students are guided to implement reflective practice in personal or team design activities. It is aimed to facilitate design reflection to advance the effects of design experiences on design leaning.

description.zh: 探討邊坡穩定、滲流、壓密及現地試驗土壤力學之分析方法(1)邊坡穩定分析理論及案例應用(2)平面滲流分析(3)壓密理論及沉陷分析(4)現地試驗土壤力學分析及其應用含電子震測錐試驗、平鈑膨脹儀試驗、水力破裂錐試驗及表面波震測試驗分析等。
description.en: 英課名：Advanced soil mechanics        Probe slope stability, seepage, consolidation and         soil mechanics analysis method of present the earth         test.      （1）The theory of slope stability analysis and case         application.      （2）Plane seepage analysis.      （3）Theory of consolidation and analysis of sink.      （4）Soil mechanics analysis of present the earth test         and that application. Include electron shake measure         cone test, plane expand instruments test, hydraulic         power rupture cone test and surface wave shake         measure test analysis, etc.

class.name: 土木環境外國學生專班

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在於提供方法，用來分析任何型式的結構物受任意動荷重所產生的應力與變化。
description.en: The primary purpose of this course is to present methods for analyzing the stresses and deflections developed in any given type of structure whenit is subjected to an arbitary dynamic loading.

class.name: 土木環境外國學生專班

description.zh: 本課程著重於中英文口頭報告能力之培養，在模擬發表過程中，培養學生使用正確的表達用法，並建立適當之應對方式。
description.en: This course offers opportunities for students to develop their oral presentation skills in both Chinese and English languages via simulated presentations in class.  Students will learn how to present their papers precisely and how to engage a conversation properly.

name.en: Project of electrical machinery control technology

description.zh: 1.轉矩控制簡介  2.磁通鏈估測  3.滑差及轉速估測 4.參數估測 5.感應機向量控制  6.感應機直接轉矩控制  7.同步機向量控制  8.同步機直接轉矩控制
description.en: 1.introduction to torque-controlled drives  2.flux-linkage estimation  3.slip and speed estimation  4.parameters estimation  5.vector control of induction machines   6.direct torque control of induction machines    7.vector control of synchronous machines  8.direct torque control of synchronous machines.

name.en: Seminar in Applied Linguistics and Applied Cultural Studies

description.zh: 應用語言學與文化應用研究相關專題，以邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗。
description.en: The Purpose of this course is to enhance students' know-how and research skills in applied linguistics and applied cultural studies. Students will participate in academic speeches and respond to academic papers in group discussion.

description.zh: 簡介，人工智慧語言介紹及工業應用，專家系統。
description.en: Introduction, Artificial Intelligence, programing language and its industrial application, expert system.

notes: 自動化所.機電所.製科所和車輛所合開

description.zh: 相圖及相變化熱力學,多元溶液及部份莫耳熱力學。以熱力學分析.設計及電腦模擬冶金方法。
description.en: The thermodynamics of phase diagrams and phase transformations. Solution thermodynamics of multi-compoment and partial molar properties. Applications of thermodynamics to the analysis, design and computer simulation of metallurgical processes.

description.zh: 本課程主要進行「永續建築環境」之相關研究議題探討與分析。於瞬息萬變之環境與極富思維空間之建築研究中並不能全然按理論或法則定律判斷，亦須依實務經驗輔以基礎理論架構予以綜合評估與分析評估。探討之內容包括但不限下面之主題：『永續建築環境規劃設計』、『永續建築環境教育』和『永續能源環境規劃設計』等相關議題間之相互依存性或相關性，藉由國內外之相關案例進行深入探討與分析，期待建立個人對現今永續建築環境之瞭解與認識。
description.en: The theme of the course is "Sustainable Architecture". It aims to provide a forum to examine and discuss solution-oriented methods for implementing sustainable development, and to stimulate more ideas and useful insights regarding architecture development within the context of sustainability. In an effort to explore and map the challenges and opportunities of sustainable development, this course aims to address the various aspects of architecture & urban development in accordance with the principles of sustainability. These themes will address issues but not limit to, architectural design, ecological and social sustainability, economic and environmental sustainability, environmentalism.

description.zh: 資訊蒐集技術是研究生在從事研究工作與論文寫作時必須具備的工具。本課程主要目的在協助研究生在眾多的資訊來源中，如何搜尋正確及高品質的資訊。課程內容涵蓋資訊蒐集技術的原則及應用，並探討多種的實用工具及電子資訊來源，以滿足研究生在作研究及論文寫作上對資訊的需求。
description.en: Information gathering skills are essential to the studying of graduate students and the development of their subject knowledge on dissertation/thesis writing. The course is designed to help graduate students to find the right kind and the right quality of information from the vast amount available.  The content of the course will deal with the broad principles and practices underlying information gathering techniques which explore the many practical tools and electronics sources of information that will help graduate students find the information they need when doing research or writing the dissertation/thesis.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討物業管理理論以及實際的操作手法。並結合現有的物業管理案例說明其實例運作方式在台灣的課題與機會。
description.en: The scope of this curriculum encompasses the theories of the propertymanagement, including:1. Introduction(The definition of Reuse, Reduce and  Recycle).2. Main methodologies and evaluating tools of building-reuse.3. Case study: Mass housing renewal in European countries & Japan.4.Renewal operation of infill-based building components: Case study on Partitions, kitchens& Sanitary spaces.5. Relation between Building renewal and urban tissue.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.。

description.zh: 講授並整合設計評價之基本理論。訓練學生針對產品之開發動機、消費者需要(needs)、市場策略、機能佈局、人機介面訴求、造形策略及創意，評估產品設計過程中思考與決策之品質，進而形成改善設計品質之建議。（本課程非本人所提議，以上課程概述僅供參考，並請提議老師指教。）
description.en: Lecture on theory and practice of Design Criticism. Discussions lead toanalysis of quality and effectiveness in design philosophy and practiceamong steps of product development process, including marketing strategy,fulfilling uses' needs, product functioning, ergonomics emphasis and stylingaccent.

description.zh: 本科目主旨在於加強學生使用語言的表達能力、並促使學生更加容易瞭解學術論文。每週的課程是由一系列連貫性的論文來引導學生去學習即分析論文，並能以口語、寫作正確地表達出所分析論文的含義。這些所提供的研究論文都具備可精闢分析的要素。這些文章的內容有包含習慣的不同、事件的相對面、意見的分歧、喜好的差異、演繹法即歸納法得的結論等等。
description.en: This course aims to enhance oral and written communication skills and in the process provide a greater understanding of the philosophy underlying academic discourse. Weekly units are oriented around a progressive series of tasks which consider academic texts in context and require learners to understand, analyse and produce spoken and written texts appropriate to the context of academic English. The contextualisation of these tasks is the philosophical aspects of critical analysis. Themes, such as the difference between convention, fact, opinion and preference; deductive and inductive proof; validity and truth; evidence; and the ethics of persuasion, are the basis on which the skills are taught.

description.zh: 本課程旨在以個別與小組合作模式，訓練學生通曉設計開發流程，以執行設計專案。藉由實務案例的運作，及兼顧產業與組織之需求，以體現產業與社會文化面的問題與解決對策。本課程又以培育學生具備專業設計師之設計企劃提案與概念發想能力，以及學生使用設計工具之能力。
description.en: The goal of Advanced Innovative Design (II) is to train, under supervision, students in strategic areas of the product development process. In these projects, the students work alone or in groups. The projects are usually based on problems defined within different branches of industry and social sectors. Project work is usually done under realistic conditions, in collaboration with different industrial companies or public institutions. Students can contribute to this reality by developing sensible and usable products and systems which include qualities that speak to the heart and mind of people. We educate students as designers to have an open mind on both conceptual ideas and detailed realistic design solutions in order to develop higher quality products. Another important focus area of this course is to improve the students' capabilities in the use of modern design tools.

description.zh: 本課程之目的係透過對文化之研究與解析，作為產品設計發展之元素，藉由設計專題之應用，開發出具文化意涵之商品，以培養學生對各種文化之解析能力，與設計之創新技能。
description.en: The aim of this course is via the research and analyze the culture, which to be the element of the development of product design. Through the application of design project to develop the cultural product. It could train the students the ability of analyzing the every cultures and the innovation skill of design.

description.zh: 認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on English writings are concerned.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

name.zh: 教育訓練實施與績效評鑑

description.zh: 為了使訓練資源的更有效運用，本課程希望讓學生了解，企業內部在實施訓練之前，應客觀、嚴謹的加以評估，並追蹤其實施後的成效，以正確評估訓練的效益。
description.en: To make better use of the training resources, the curriculum expects to make students understand that any enterprise should objectively and carefully evaluate the training program before its employment, and keep track of its effect after its employment to make sure the effectiveness of the training program.

description.zh: (1) 探討比較技職教育的意義、發展與研究方法。(2) 介紹主要國家的技職教育制度。(3) 從事比較技職教育問題的分析。
description.en: (1) Examination of concepts, development and research methodology of comparative technical-vocational education.(2) Knowledge in comparison technical-vocational education in Chinese in terms of purpose system and problems with those of selected foreign countries.(3) Analysis of major research regarding contemporary trends and issues in comparative technical-vocational education.

description.zh: 這是一門土研所的選修課，由內容包括：地震學及地震工程，強地動，振動時最高粒子速度之預測，自然頻率與阻尼之估計與量測，地盤反應分析，基地影響與設計地盤震動，打樁振動分析與永久位移，微振動量測與分析，爆炸設計等。課程中並學習使用軟體Matlab作為分析計算之主要工具。
description.en: This course is optional to all postgraduate students. The content of lectures:Seismology and earthquakes, Strong fround motion, prediction of peak particle vibrations, microvibrations, blast design.

name.zh: 第二語言習得專題討論

description.zh: 本課程將對第二語言習得的主要議題進行深入地探討論與分析。上課的內容包括，但不限於，下列主題: 語言天賦、跨語言影響、人格特質、學習動機、學習風格、學習策略、外語焦慮和外語學習信念等。
description.en: This course is designed to engage students in intensive study and analysis of selected issues and problems in second language acquisition. The topics covered in this course include, but are not limited to, the following: language aptitude, cross-linguistic influences, personality, motivation, leaning styles, learning strategies, language anxiety, and learners' beliefs.

description.zh: 本課程為任職於英語教育之教師所設計，主旨在於分析數位教材於英語教學中的角色。藉由電腦/科技輔助語言教學、電腦媒介溝通、以及線上教學相關理論、研究與應用的研討來瞭解數位教材如何輔助英語學習。因應數位教材與學習者特性所採用之評量、評估、以及施測方法亦將是本課程重點。
description.en: This course is designed for in-service English teachers to analyze the pedagogical role of electronic courseware in the language classroom. Theories and studies of CALL (computer-assisted language learning), TELL (technology-enhanced language learning), CMC (computer-mediated communication), and online learning will be discussed to understand the utilization of electronic courseware in assisting English learning. Assessment, evaluation, and testing measurements in responding to electronic courseware and to learner characteristics will also be discussed.

description.zh: 課程專為欲深度瞭解英文文學史的中學教師與研究所學生而設計。課程將引領學生研讀17世紀至今的英國文學文本，種類包含詩、戲劇、小說與自傳。學生需利用課內與課外的時間研讀文本，以利學生跳脫其熟悉之課程框架，於實務教學思維上有所創新發想。本課程之評分將以實際的教學示範、短篇寫作作業，以及學生參與程度為主要標準，論文報告次之。
description.en: This course is designed for the high school teacher and for any graduate student who wants a thorough background in the history of English literature. Students will read British literary texts from the seventh century to the present in the genres of poetry, drama, fiction, and autobiography. Some texts will be read outside of class; others will be read/acted in class, allowing students to come away with practical teaching ideas for their own classes. This course, instead of culminating in a major seminar paper, is graded based on sample teaching demonstrations, shorter writing assignments, and student participation.

description.zh: 模糊集合之觀念與數學原理，數學運算，近似推理理論，解模糊方法之設計，模糊控制器之設計，模糊控制器之數學模式，理論分析及其應用。
description.en: Mathematical principle,  peration for fuzzy control theory, Design, mathematical model, theoretical Analysis and application for FUZZY controlller.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。決策模式、決策的環境分析、決策目標訂定、決策標準、決策樹分析、決策者心理分析，常用之統計分析理論與實證之訓練。
description.en: Decision Model, Environmental Analysis of Decision, Decision Objectives Setting, Decision Criteria, Decision Tree Analysis, Psychological Analysis of Decision Maker, Theories and Practical Training of Statistic Analysis.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。授課內容包括著作、商標、專利、營業秘密法，兢業禁止，跳槽與保密及智慧財產權管理之法律與實務，並以概論、個案研究及專題創作方式深入討論。
description.en: Including law and practical management of writings, trademark, patent, business secret and intellectual property rights, and it also offers deeper discussion by way of summary, designated subject or case study.

description.zh: 快速原型加工原理、快速原型系統分類、加工參數與加工結果分析，製程設備研究，快速模具技術研究，快速原型與快速模具實習，專題研究與討論。
description.en: Principle of rapid prototyping, Classification of rapid prototyping systems, Analysis of manufacturing parameters and working results, Study of manufacturing equipments, Study of rapid tooling, Practice of rapid prototyping and rapid tooling, Special projects and discussion.

name.zh: 高等電腦輔助工程分析

description.zh: 讓學生了解並熟悉工程軟體於工程問題分析之應用，培養解決實務及研發問題的能力。課程概述：在具備固體、熱流等力學及有限元素分析理論的基礎上，利用3D繪圖與高階有限元素分析整合軟體，將工程實務問題作實體建模，並進行物理行為模擬分析與理論驗證，包括靜態、動態、落下測試、穩定性、疲勞、熱傳、非線性、多重物理參數耦合及最佳化等問題之實例演練。最後以實際研發專題作為本課程學習之體驗。
description.en: On the basis of applied mechanics such as the solid, thermal fluid and finite element analysis theory, utilize the computer engineering software, which the 3D computer aided drawing is integrated with finite element analysis, to simulate the practical engineering problem. The physical behaviors such as static, dynamic, dropping testing, stability, fatigue, heat transfer, nonlinearity, coupled multi-physics and optimization, etc. can be verified and predicted through the simulating analysis for several practical model. The course will give both comprehensive experience and knowledge of a special researching topic finally.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。     創新設計之意涵，創新設計之方法，創新設計之個案研究，智慧財產權之維護。
description.en: Meaning of Creative Design, Methods of Creative Design, Case study of Creative Design,      Protection of Intellectual Properties.

description.zh: 精確度、重覆性、精密度及解析度等、彈性變形及動態特性、背隙摩擦及動態特性、系統補償、精密機構及動態分析。
description.en: Accuracy, Repeatability, Precision and Resolution; Elastic Deformation, Backlash, Friction and their Dynamic Properties; System Compensation; precision Mechanisms and Dynamic Analysis.

notes: 乙/6選2 機電所和製科所合開

name.zh: 醫療器材開發數位化工程
name.en: Digital technology on medical device development

description.zh: 本課程目的在使學生了解醫療器材數位化發展趨勢，課程中透過介紹牙科及骨科等相關領域之應用。結合醫學資訊與3D 影像處理進行產品設計與創新製造工程，也是學習之重點。
description.en: Course purpose:To describe how to use 3D image information in medical device field, To use direct manufacturing technology in medical treatment, To know the current industrial trend.

description.zh: 本課程主要內容包括:核能電廠系統熱流與安全分析、量化風險評估(Probabilistic Risk Assessment, 簡稱PRA)兩個主要部份。核能安全相關議題如，核反應器熱的產生、熱流與應力分析，核反應器重要系統與組件，核能電廠事故分析，核能電廠的環境輻射劑量。PRA技術可全面檢討核能電廠潛在弱點，提昇核電機組營運安全。內容包括基本機率理論介紹、隨機變數與分佈函數、可靠度方法論、事件樹與故障樹分析、不準度分析及傳播等方法。並將包括PRA技術在核能電廠系統之應用。
description.en: This lecture will mainly covers the thermal-hydraulics and safety analyses and the methods for probability of risk assessment (PRA) for nuclear power plants. Thermal hydraulics and safety analyses will includes: design of fission reactors; energy conversion in nuclear power systems; fluid flow system, thermal and structural analysis of reactor core. The weakness of nuclear power plants can be identified through the PRA technology. Therefore, the safety feature of the associated structures of systems and components will be improved. Lecture would include basic concept of probability, random variables and distribution functions, applications to the reliability assessment of components, event-tree and fault-tree analysis, uncertainty analysis and its propagation, etc. Examples and applications in nuclear plants will be addressed as well.

description.zh: 模具工程不只要讓初學者熟悉模具的設計，而且要讓有經驗的模具設計者也能夠以工程的方法來設計模具。此外模具工程也提供塑膠工業相關的從業人員瞭解模具知識，如銷售員與售後服務人員。課程內容分為四大部分：(1)基礎─包含模具、射出機、塑膠材料、產品等。(2)模具設計的一般方針─模具佈置、澆口、流道、排氣、頂出、模具冷卻等。(3)模具的規格：模具零件與材料、模具加工、強度與疲勞。(4) 模具性能：模具壽命、成形週期、成形品之肉厚、尺寸、形狀等。 (5)特殊成形法：共射、埋入件、氣輔、覆蓋、微射出、金屬射出、陶瓷射出等。
description.en: Mold Engineering is to familiarize not only beginners in mold design but also more experienced mold designers with an engineering approach to mold design. In addition, mold engineering is also recommended mold knowledge to any individuals, such as sales and service personnel, in the plastic industry who need to understand mold in their activities. This course is divided into four sections: (1) Basics about Mold, Injection Machine, Plastics, and Products. (2) General Mold Design Guideline: mold layout, gate, runner, venting, ejection, mold cooling. (3) Specification of the Mold: mold parts and material, mold machining, strength and fatigue. (4) Mold Performance: mold life, cycle time, wall thickness, product size and shape. (5) Special Injection Molding: Coinjection molding, Insert molding, Gas-assistant injection molding, over molding, micro injection molding, Metal injection molding, Ceramic injection molding.

name.en: Taguchi Method on the Quality Design

description.zh: (1)「田口方法」介紹(2)完整的「田口方法」，包含以下三個主題：(a) S/N比之理論基礎及進階應用；(b)直交表之理論基礎及進階應用；(c)變異分析。(3)應用「田口方法」進行專案研究，並繳交專案主題與報告。
description.en: (1) The course gives step-by-step to explaining the "Taguchi Method" for the students.     (2) The course gives the fully "Taguchi Method" for the students during a short time, which including three topical subjects:  (a) The basic theory of S/N ratio and its advanced applications.  (b) The basic theory of Orthogonal Arrays and its advanced applications.  (c) Analysis of Variance (ANOVA)  (3) Students will use the "Taguchi Method" to proceeding a project study, and hand over their theme and report of project.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。授課內容包括著作、商標、專利、營業秘密法，兢業禁止，跳槽與保密及智慧財產權管理之法律與實務，並以概論、個案研究及專題創作方式深入討論。
description.en: Including law and practical management of writings, trademark, patent, business secret and intellectual property rights, and it also offers deeper discussion by way of summary, designated subject or case study.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹電腦輔助設計及電腦輔助製造的系統及方法。包括：三D工件建圖、設計計算及分析、製造實驗及分析、軟體寫作、網路、NC程式寫作、製程模擬、智慧型製程控制及優化、電腦整合製造系統。
description.en: Introducing the system and methods about computer aided design and manufacturing. Topics covered including: three dimensional parts modeling, calculation and analysis during design process, manufacturing experiment and analysis, software programming, communication network, simulation of manufacturing process, motion control, intelligent manufacturing process control and optimization, computer integrated manufacturing system.

description.zh: 愈來愈多的商業活動在網路上進行，蓬勃發展的電子商務，也對現有的法律與政策造成許多挑戰。本課程將對電子商務的發展做一概要介紹，其後由網路科技與智財法律的概論談起，接著以目前智財法規所面臨的議題為主，並挑選台灣與國際的知名案例，讓學生兼顧理論與實務，建立對電子商務法規與政策發展的認識。
description.en: Doing business online is more and more prevalent nowadays, nonetheless, as e-commerce activities striving rapidly, new legal challenges are calling for attention. This course will start with an introduction on the characteristics and developments of e-commerce activities, following by the exploration and discussion on relevant literature and cases. Noted that this course will focus on the intellectual property laws and make comparative studies in order to equip students with an in-depth understanding and knowledge on these issues.

name.zh: 美國專利訴訟專題研究
name.en: Special Topics on U.S. Patent Litigation

description.zh: 請見英文概述。
description.en: This course is a research-based course. Students will be exposed to various legal issues involving U.S. patent litigation. The procedural issues are mainly explored. Each student will be assigned with one research topic.

description.zh: 本課程針對固體廢棄物的來源及基本性質，分析並介紹各種固體廢棄物再生的技術與方法實例。
description.en: This class include the discussion of the origin of the solid waste and its basic physical and chemical properties that related to its recovery, recycling and reutilization.  The recovery methods and the follow-up process to recycle the solid waste will also be discussed.  Several practical case study will be included.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意.類神經網路介紹: 演算法,應用,與程式技巧，類神經網路控制器設計與模擬，模糊集合,近似推理理論,模糊邏輯控制器介紹，模糊邏輯控制器設計與模擬，基因演算法介紹，以基因演算法最佳化控制器，智慧型控制應用。
description.en: 1.Introduction to neural network: algorithms, applications, programming techniques. 2. Design and simulation of neural network controller3. Introduction to fuzzy set, approximate reasoning, fuzzy logic controller4. Design and simulation of fuzzy logic controller5. Introduction to genetic algorithm6. Optimization of controller by genetic algorithm7. Applications of intelligent controller

description.zh: 先修課程：半導體元件物理﹙4005032﹚。本課程著重於IC製程技術之學習。課程內容包括：IC絕緣技術、模組製程技術、導線技術、整合工程技術、SOC技術及半導體奈米元件技術等。
description.en: A study on advanced IC process. The contents cover IC isolation technology, module process, interconnection line process, process integration, SOC applications and CMOS nano device engineering etc.
