description.zh: 本課程探討運用物件導向技術開發軟體系統的過程與步驟，透過課程資訊系統專題製作，學習者將練習以UML分析與設計軟體系統，並使用一個物件導向語言(如Java或C++)實作之。課程內容: 1. 物件導向概念與模型語言 - UML介紹。2. 物件導向程式語言與環境介紹。3. 物件導向軟體開發生命週期，包括3.1物件導向需求分析 - 使用案例模型和活動圖，3.2物件導向設計 - 循序圖、類別圖、元件圖、部署圖、設計樣式，3.3 物件導向程式設計 - 設計與程式撰寫之應對。4. 專題製作。
description.en: English DescriptionThis course familiarizes the students with the principles and techniques for object-oriented software development. The students will use UML and an object-oriented language such as Java or C++ to complete a term programming project. Course contents: 1. Object-oriented modeling with UML, 2. Object-oriented languages and environments, 3. Object-oriented software development process: 3.1 Object-oriented analysis - requirement analysis, use case analysis, activity diagram, 3.2 Object-oriented design – sequence diagram, class diagrams, component diagram, deployment diagram, design patterns, 3.3 Construction - mapping design to object-oriented codes, 4. Term project.

name.zh: 產業策略規劃與技術布局
name.en: Industry Strategic Planning and Technology Road-Mapping

description.zh: 產業策略規劃與技術布局課程旨在教育學生對高科技、傳統與服務產業之屬性深入了解與培養策略規劃之核心能力，並且藉由跨領域實作課程中，學習技術布局流程，以培養科技大學學生進入職場之策略規劃與技術布局能力。課程包含六大新興、四大智慧、十大服務產業之策略規劃學理內涵、流程、技術研析與布局，並由案例說明導引分組討論與發表。
description.en: The purpose of the "Industry Strategic Planning and Technology Road-Mapping" class is to educate students to have the more insight capability on the Hi-Tech, Conventional, and Service Industries and to learn the processes of the strategic planning and technology road-mapping. This is also intent to assist the Technology University students to shorten their industry learning curve once they are hired. The class will introduce the Taiwan six emerging industries, four intelligent industries, and ten service industries including the background, justifications, process, and technology roadmap. Also, it will have the several case-studies to lead the student to do the exercise through the group discussion and present their findings and results.

name.zh: 電源管理積體電路設計

description.zh: 本課程在訓練培養學生具有設計電源管理積體電路的能力，內容包含：1. 介紹 2. 線性穩壓器 3. 震盪器 4. 運算放大器 5. 參考電路 6. 直流-交流電源轉換 7. 同步整流電路 8. 電流感測電路 9. 專題介紹
description.en: This course is trained the students to own the design capability of power management IC. The contents of this course: 1. Introduction 2. Linear Regulator 3. Oscillator 4. Operational amplifiers 5.Reference circuits 6. DC-DC conversion 7. Synchronous-Rectified circuit 8. Current sensing circuits 9. Case study

description.zh: 1. Matlab/Simulink簡介2. 控制系統建模3. 線性時變控制系統分析4. 可觀測性與可控制性5. 李亞普若夫穩定度分析6. 曲線擬合與系統建模7. 控制器設計8. 數值範例演練
description.en: 1. Introduction to Matlab/Simulink2. Modeling of Control Systems3. Analysis of Linear Time-Varying Control Systems4. Observability and Controllability5. Lyapunov Stability Analysis6. Curve Fitting and System Modeling7. Controller Design8. Numerical Examples

description.zh: 現代能源工程技術，決定製程成本，故如何統合有效率的能源管理技術是決定產品競爭力的關鍵，本課程主要內容為：    1.能源成本控制    2.區域型電力能管理策略    3.能源系統的經濟性設計概念    4.冷暖系統的檢測與分析    5.總合能源操作的工程化資料收集    6.新能源系統的生態模組化設計
description.en: At the completion of this course, students will be able to.1.Compare and contrast the various forms of energy eonversion.2.Examine the techmologies used to convert chemical energy into mechanical energy.3.Apply the concepts of electrical converters.4.Evaluate the major types of energy storage.5.Deformine how human values affect the success of energy conservation.6.Analyze the methods in which energy can be conserved with in the various energy sectors of society.

description.zh: 課程通過一系列關於城市的文本(文學、電影、建築、或其他藝術），思考人跟城市的關係：文化產物如何呈現城市，和城市設計如何給不同思潮影響。如果都市化成了大趨勢，如果我們當下的存在處境離不開城市及對它的想象，我們就有理由研究城市和建築空間在不同歷史脈絡下如何影響人，和如何閱讀城市這充滿符號的文本。課程會介紹關於城市的著作、論述和理論，也會探討如現代性、後現代主義、全球化、殖民主義、解構等議題。如可能，課程會安排實地考察。
description.en: Through works of fiction, films, architecture and urbanscape, this course examines how the city is represented in texts and how cities have shaped thinking. We will examine both the visible features of a city (architecture, monumental buildings, preservation projects) and also what Calvino means by the 'invisible city.'  Cities represented in texts include Manchester, London, Paris, St. Petersburg, Buenos Aires, New York, Shanghai, Taipei, Hong Kong and Macau. Topics concerning modernity, postmodernism, globalization, colonization, and deconstruction will be explored. A field trip may be included if feasible.

name.en: Special Topics of Processing of Ceramics

description.zh: 第一章 陶瓷製程概論1.1陶瓷產品1.2陶瓷製程特色1.3目前瞭解程度　　第二章 固. 液 氣三相反應　2.1三相反應2.2乾燥第三章 粉末特性評估　　　 3.1名詞定義3.2粉末規格3.3熱化與熱物分析3.4粉末之密度　　　第四章 成形前處理之製程　　4.1粉碎4.2混合4.3成團第五章 成形製程5.1乾壓法5.2注漿法5.3塑性成形法第六章 膠體狀態與穩定6.1固液相界面6.2帶電界面6.3穩定態6.4流變性質第七章 懸浮液系統7.1水懸浮液7.2泥漿性質7.3牛頓型懸浮液7.4有抗粘劑容液流變性質第八章 濕製程8.1壓濾製程8.2離心製程8.3注漿製程8.4乳化及發泡製程8. 5其他
description.en: This course is a special topics of Special topics of Processings of Ceramics.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 本課程綜合介紹電化學之原理，電化學程序和反應器之輸送理論、操作和設計，並介紹相關之電化學工業。
description.en: This course involves three parts: the comprehensive introduction to principles of electrochemistry,the transport theory, design and operation of electrochemical processes and reactors, and the related electrochemical industries.

description.zh: 設計專業用進階德文；設計專業德文導讀及加強德文的聽、說、讀、寫能力，概念理解及溝通設計用之德文。
description.en: The alphabet pronunciation, phonation, sentence structures and the ten parts speech grammar of advanced German to building the capability of reading, speaking, writing and understanding the design advanced German.

description.zh: 本課程旨在以個別與小組合作模式，訓練學生通曉設計開發流程，以執行設計專案。藉由實務案例的運作，及兼顧產業與組織之需求，以體現產業與社會文化面的問題與解決對策。本課程又以培育學生具備專業設計師之設計企劃提案與概念發想能力，以及學生使用設計工具之能力。
description.en: The goal of Advanced Product Design (II) is to train, under supervision, students in strategic areas of the product development process. In these projects, the students work alone or in groups. The projects are usually based on problems defined within different branches of industry and social sectors. Project work is usually done under realistic conditions, in collaboration with different industrial companies or public institutions. Students can contribute to this reality by developing sensible and usable products and systems which include qualities that speak to the heart and mind of people. We educate students as designers to have an open mind on both conceptual ideas and detailed realistic design solutions in order to develop higher quality products. Another important focus area of this course is to improve the students' capabilities in the use of modern design tools.

description.zh: 本課程介紹國際金融市場與金融機構以及金融系統。本課程涵蓋範圍包含: 股票市場、貨幣市場、債券市場、外匯市場、房貸市場、投資銀行、保險產業、基金市場…等。主要目的在讓學生了解整個金融市場是如何運作，以及金融機構如何營運。另外，再以個案討論方式讓學生對整體的金融市場與機構有通盤的了解。
description.en: This course introduces the international financial markets and institutions (i.e. money market, bond market, stock market, mortgage market, foreign exchange market, investment banks, commercial banks…etc). The objectives of this course are to develop a fundamental understanding of (i) how financial markets and institutions work; (ii) how financial systems affect people and daily life.

name.en: Theory and Practice of Landscape Ecological Planning

description.zh: 景觀生態學是以生態學理論來理解並建立一套可以認知景觀與其中的生物﹑非生物環境關係的學科。有關景觀的生態規劃理論基本上是將這一系列景觀生態學模型或原理作為設計指標而形成的一套規劃操作理論。景觀生態原理在景觀學科中具有極其根本的角色，不僅在景觀資源保育與管理上提供極具價值的參考；對於景觀規畫與設計實務者更提供了在不同尺度範疇狀況下三向度空間設計的形態準則。因此，課程涵蓋了從區域、基地和細部設計三種尺度的設計內涵，講述及操作在基於不同目的的需求時，人為景觀如何介入自然環境，以及導入的人為景觀的設計準則。 1. 景觀生態與形態理論 2. 景觀生態設計理論 3. 景觀生態規劃理論的應用 a. 都市地區和鄉村地區 b. 區域、基地和細部設計尺度
description.en: Landscape ecology seeks for principles and models that contribute to dealing with conservation, management, and planning in landscape practice. The course "Landscape Theory and Practice of Ecological Planning" refers to those principles and models established in landscape ecology and then applies to landscape planning and design. Issues relates to this courses are listed as follows; 1. Landscape Ecology and landscape morphology 2. Ecological planning theory 3. The application of ecological theory in landscape practice a. Urban region and countryside b. Macro-sale, meso-sale, and micro-scale

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意包括10個數值問題1. 簡單熱傳導2. 穩態圓柱熱傳問題3. 完全展開管流4. 翼片對流展開管流5. 理想流體6. 突然膨脹壓縮流7. 自由對流完全展開流8. 軸對稱流9. 無限反應燃燒流場10. 亂流流場
description.en: Including ten problems1. Simple pure conduction problem2. cylindrical conduction for steady non uniform k3. fully develop duct4. fin conduction convection for fully develop5. ideal flow6. sudden expansion compressible7. Free convective flow for fully develop8. Axial symmetry flow9. Infinitely combustion reaction10. Turbulent flow

description.zh: 本課程主要的內容包括有；生物醫用材料的發展概況及趨勢；生物醫用材料的生物相容性及生物學評價；可降解與吸收材料之機制及調控；組織工程材料與人工器官--軟組織修復與重建；硬組織修復與骨組織工程材料，也就是生物活性陶瓷、金屬植入材料之表面生物活化功能和塗層；口腔材料；控制釋放材料；仿生智能材料；生物醫用材料表面改質等。
description.en: In addition to the fundamentals of surface treatment, biological interactions of materials, mechanical properties, ceramics and composite materials in biomedical application, corrosion mechanisms of metallic biomaterials and engineering problems associated with materials will be introduced.  The contents of this course will include the development of biomaterials, the biocompatibility of materials, mechanisms of biodegradable and bio-absorbable materials. It will illustrate the advanced concepts of medical devices, artificial organs (implants), dental materials, tissue engineering and drug eluting technologies as well.

name.zh: 植入物與矯具生物力學

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。生物力學是一門整合醫學與工學的學科。本課程介紹並討論十大主題：(1)脊椎生物力學、(2)關節生物力學、(3)骨折生物力學、(4)復健生物力學、(5)運動生物力學、(6)心血管生物力學、(7)植入物設計原理、(8)手術器械設計原理、(9)矯具設計原理與(10)病床與輪椅設計原理。
description.en: Biomechanics is a multi-discipline branch incorporating medicine and mechanics. Ten topics are introduced and discussed in this class: (1) spinal biomechanics, (2) joint biomechanics, (3) trauma biomechanics, (4) rehabilitation biomechanics, (5) sport biomechanics, (6) cardiovascular biomechanics, (7) implant design, (8) instrument design, (9) orthotice design, and (10) sickbed and wheelchair design.

notes: 製科所12選3,製科所和機電所合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹最新的製造技術。利用物理式及化學式的製造方法來加工新進材料，使用新進光電能源及新進製造工具如雷射、電子束、離子束、電漿、鑽石、化學反應劑等，適應生產微小精密工件之需求，應用電腦化資訊處理設備以監控、診斷及調適製程，以達到智慧型製造的目的。
description.en: Introducing newest manufacturing technology.  Applying  physical and chemical manufacturing methods to process advanced materials, using advanced power source and tools like laser, electron beam, ion beam, plasma, diamond, chemical react agents, adapting the demand for producing small and precision parts, Implementing computerized data processing facilities to control, monitor, diagnose, adapt manufacturing process, in order to achieve the idea of intelligent manufacturing.

name.en: Special Topics on Clean Power System

description.zh: 介紹各種潔淨且高效率的先進車輛動力系統的型式及其工作原理並分析技巧。項目包含車輛能源所面臨的一些問題及可能的解決方案、優良動力源的特性、電動系統、複合電動系統、複合氣動系統、氫燃料電池動力系統、金屬燃料電池動力系統、各種替代性燃料的特性及優缺點、太陽光電輔助動力系統等。
description.en: This course introduces various kinds of clean and high-efficiency vehicular power systems, their operation principles, and analytical skills.  Topics include: problems and possible solutions the vehicular power system faces, characteristics of a good vehicular power system, electric power system, hybrid electric power system, hybrid pneumatic power system, fuel cell power system, metallic fuel-cell power system, substitutive fuels, and solar-energy auxiliary power system.

description.zh: 本課程旨在針對流通業中各項經營管理項目作探討，其中包含設施位置選定，人力資源，流通規劃，及銷售促進等。此外，商用地理資訊系統之應用及個案研討亦包含在此課程中。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to study the required management issues of retail business，such as location selection，human resource ，retail planning ，and marketing etc。Besides，at also includes business GIS and case study.

description.zh: 專題討論照明與視覺心理等課題，期能對於照明相關知識能有深刻了解，並能藉課堂的研討與文獻閱讀等方法提出見解。課程內容包括永續發展之綠色照明、照明與色彩、眩光之評價、光源之新發展、燈具之美、高齡者之照明環境、防災照明、視覺與輝度分布、照明耗能評估指標與基準、晝光利用、照明之控制、道路照明與安全、戶外照明與都市環境、光污染等。
description.en: The topic is discussed with lighting and visual psychology that expect to understand some knowledge about lighting, by the method of discussion and technical literature reading to provide an opinion about lighting. The course are including green lighting for sustainable development, lighting and color, the evaluation of glare, the new tendency of lighting source, the beauty of luminair, lighting for venerable age, lighting for fire control, visual and luminance distribution, evaluation index and base of lighting energy, the advantage of daylight, lighting control, road lighting and safety, outdoor lighting and urban environment, lighting pollution.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the IE related journals.  The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

name.zh: 就業達人講座-職場自我行銷

description.zh: 本校為強化學生的就業能力，加強學生的職場競爭力，開設「就業達人講座-職場自我行銷」之課程，藉由業界主管與人員分享面試應對技巧、魅力溝通表達、職場自我行銷、以及職場生涯規劃等議課題，提昇學生對於職場的認識，並進一步提升學生的就業率。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance student’s competitive ability in the workplace. The course contents include tips of interview, self-marketing in the workplace and the planning of the career life etc. By the topics, students will be equipped with a variety of presentation skills that needed in the workplace to raise the employment rate.

notes: 四光四.光電所和最後一哩合開,三ABC節上課

description.zh: 本課程目標在為本校碩博士班的同學做好英語終身學習的準備。確切學習要點： 1. 建立個人英文資料檔案(含自傳、履歷、求職信件等)。 2. 學習如何運用媒體與英語雜誌及廣播持續不斷地自我提升英文程度。 3. 以活潑的上課方式(唱歌、短劇、演講、講笑話等)培養同學英語溝通表達的能力與膽量。 4. 以閱讀英語學習雜誌培養閱讀能力，並藉由內容的深入討論擴大視野，了解全球現勢與重要議題。
description.en: The aim of this course is to help students (1) sharpen up their learning skills in English language/culture acquisition, (2) prepare a personal dossier (including autobiography, resume, CV and application letters) in English for their future career needs, (3) build up their communication skills through classroom activities, such as singing, reciting passages, short plays, small talks, and speeches.

description.zh: 本課程目標在為本校碩博士班的同學做好英語終身學習的準備。確切學習要點： 1. 建立個人英文資料檔案(含自傳、履歷、求職信件等)。 2. 學習如何運用媒體與英語雜誌及廣播持續不斷地自我提升英文程度。 3. 以活潑的上課方式(唱歌、短劇、演講、講笑話等)培養同學英語溝通表達的能力與膽量。 4. 以閱讀英語學習雜誌培養閱讀能力，並藉由內容的深入討論擴大視野，了解全球現勢與重要議題。
description.en: The aim of this course is to help students (1) sharpen up their learning skills in English language/culture acquisition, (2) prepare a personal dossier (including autobiography, resume, CV and application letters) in English for their future career needs, (3) build up their communication skills through classroom activities, such as singing, reciting passages, short plays, small talks, and speeches.

description.zh: 引擎及主要控制系統介紹，引擎動力系統之數學模式（含進氣系統、油路系統、點火系統、廢氣排放系統），閉迴路空燃比控制，爆震控制，引擎怠速之控制，引擎等速之控制，引擎加速／減速調整。
description.en: Introduction of Engine and Main Control System, Mathematical Model of Engine Dynamic System (Including Inlet System, Oil-Loop System, Ignition System, Exhaust System), Closed-Loop Air-Fuel Ratio Control, Detonation Control, Engine Idle Speed Control, Engine Cruising Speed Control, Engine Acceleration/Deceleration Regulation.

description.zh: 以傳統與革新的觀點探究技職教育方案評鑑的理論與實務，包括專有名詞、評鑑的規劃、評鑑取向、評鑑標準、評鑑倫理、評鑑人員、資料蒐集分析與解釋的方法、評鑑結果的報告及後設評鑑等相關議題。
description.en: Exploring the program evaluation theory and practice from both traditional and innovative point of view on Technical-Vocational Education, including: design evaluation plans, evaluation ethics, evaluation standard, evaluator, design tools for collecting data, conduct observations and interviews, interpret data, write reports, provide assistance in communicating findings to various stakeholder groups, and metaevaluation.

description.zh: 本課程引入生活性的學習方法來誘發學生學習動機，並培養可在社會與職場運用的四項英文基本技能。課程目標在幫助學生在生活實境習得英文，為他們裝備可溝通表達於日常、社交活動，並提升職涯的整合性英文技能。每堂課程都注重在以學生為中心的學習活動中帶入全真、應用性高的英文技巧。課程設計涵蓋的功能包括課堂分享與作業、日常互動英文以及專業英文練習。主要課題包括溝通，簡報與談判技巧，應用閱讀與寫作，聽力技巧運用，語言與文化。
description.en: This course introduces real-world based learning approaches for students to raise their learning aspirations and to develop four essential English skills that are applicable in social and professional encounters. This course aims to help students practice English in most real-life settings and to equip them with integrated skills to advance their careers. Every class session focuses on bringing authentic and applied English in student-centered leaning activities. The class design covers the functions like information sharing and task-based activities, social interactions, and professional English practices. Essential topics include communication, techniques of negotiation and presentation, applied reading and writing, strategies for developing listening skills and language learning across cultures.

name.zh: 嵌入式即時多工核心開發與應用
name.en: The Development and Application of Embedded Multitasking Real-time Kernel

description.zh: 本課程在使學生認識嵌入式即時多工核心，瞭解其架構，並學習嵌入式即時多工核心之設計與相關應用技術。內容包含：(1)嵌入式系統介紹，(2)即時多工系統觀念介紹，(3)即時多工核心運作方式，(4)工作管理，(5)時間管理，(6)記憶體管理，(7)事件管理，(8)於嵌入式系統建制即時多工核心。
description.en: This course let students to understand the embedded multitasking real-time kernel.  They will parse the structure of multitasking real-time kernel; learn the skill to design the embedded multitasking real-time kernel and the application technology.  The contents of this course are: (1)Embedded system introduction, (2)Multitasking real-time concept, (3)Kernel structure, (4)Task management, (5) Time management, (6)Memory management, (7) Event management, (8)Real-Time kernel porting.

description.zh: 藉由本課程讓學生了解下列智慧建築之相關事項： 1、智慧建築之發展及構成。 2、智慧化科技對建築物之影響與效益。3、智慧建築標章之介紹。4、智慧建築之資通訊應用。5、智慧建築之系統整合與綜合佈線。 6、智慧型建築之設施管理。7、智慧建築之健康舒適。8、智慧建築之節能管理 9、智慧建築之安全防災。10、智慧建築之規劃設計與案例說明。
description.en: To provide students with the knowledge about intelligent buildings, the following topics are taught in this course: 1.The development and composition of intelligent building 2.Influence of automation technology on buildings 3. Introduction of intelligent building  label  4. ITC applicationins in intelligent building 5.System integration and wiring for intelligent building 6.Facilities management of intelligent building 7. Healthy and comfortable for intelligent building  8. Energy saving management of intelligent building  9. Safety and disaster prevention for intelligent building 10.Planning, design, and case studies of intelligent building

description.zh: 1.照明光源及燈具介紹：白熾燈、螢光燈、弧光燈、LED燈2.輻射度學、光度學、色度學之基本物理概念與單位3.照明光度學之量測方法與儀器介紹4.點光源之照度計算 5.多光源之平均照度計算 6.照度之品質與評價7.幾何光學：折射、反射、全反射、散射、材料色散、吸收、螢光激發 8.LED的發光原理與特性指標：顏色、效率、壽命、光形、光譜、熱散 9.白光LED的特徵：色溫、演色性 10.LED光源的封裝與二次光學透鏡
description.en: 1.(Lighting Luminaire: Incandescent Lamp, Fluorescent Lamp, High Intensity Discharge lamp, LED Lamp)2.concepts and Units of Radiometry/Photometry/Colorimetry3.Photometry Test Method and Understanding Test Report4.Calcuating Illuminance at a Point5.Average illuminance Calculation6.Quantity and Quality of Illumination7.Geometric optics8.Characteristics of LED 9.White light LED Characteristics: CCT and CRI10.Optical package and Secondary optics for LED

notes: 四光四.光電所和最後一哩合開,限7人

description.zh: 電腦軟體為資訊時代不可或缺之基本元素。為保護撰寫電腦程式者之創作結晶，惟有依賴相關之智慧財產權之保護。然而，專利權之保護不同於其它智慧財產權,須經一定的標準審查與核准，才能獲得專利法所授予之保護。本課程將介紹此專利法下，相關電腦軟體之規定。
description.en: Computer software is one of the essential elements in the information age. Software programmers can protect their endeavors and creativity only rely on relevant laws related to intellectual property. In regarding to the patent protection for computer software, the criteria for patent grants are much different from other IP laws. Thus course will introduce these rules related to patent grants.

description.zh: N
description.en: N

description.zh: 微加工程序含MUMPS，打樣、沉積、蝕刻；設計工具含MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 等；應用例含壓力感測器、加速度計、探針卡、微波元件、生物晶片等；最後介紹封裝與測試技術。
description.en: 1. Introductions of Microsystem 2. Micromachining Processes include MUMPS, Pattern, Deposition, Etching 3. Design Tool include MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 4.Applications include Pressure sensor, Accelerometer, …,etc, -probe card and other, RFMEMS, BioMEMS 5.Packaging and testing.

description.zh: 課程內容包括：課程分為三部分，第一、接合技術之基礎：材料表面結構和接合力學。第二、介紹一般工程用接合技術：機械接合、銲接、銲接冶金、軟硬銲、金屬-陶瓷接合、擴散鍵結、和膠合。第三、接合應用：真空系統和微電子接合和密封結構介紹。
description.en: This course is divided into three sections. The first three chapters deal with those chapters which are the principles of joining, including: Introduction, Surface science, and The mechanics of joining. The next six chapters describe the engineering options currently available for the joining and assembly of the components of an engineering system, including: Mechanical bonding, Welding, Welding Metallurgy, Soldering & Brazing, Metal-Ceramic Joints & Diffusion Bonding, Adhesives, and Structural Adhesives. The last two chapters take two areas of special interest, vacuum system and microelectronics, and survey the range of resolutions to joining problems which have been developed for these specific application.

description.zh: 控制理論及應用簡介、線性空間及線性運算子、線性動態方程式及反應、可控制性可觀測性及穩定性、狀態回授及狀態預估、多變數I/O控制器設計及應用。
description.en: Introduction, Linear spaces and linear operators, linear dynamic equations, controllability, observability, stability analysis, state feedback and state prediction, multi-input multi-output systems, controller design and application.

name.zh: 數位化設計與開發特論
name.en: Special Topics on e-Design and e-Development

description.zh: 如何藉由商務模型的分析，建置數位化協同產品設計與開發環境，並說明資料管理、構型管隨著網路時代的來臨，不但造成數位化協同產品設計與開發觀念的興起，也造成數位化協同平台技術逐漸成熟，並且將同步工程觀念的實現更往前邁進一大步。本課程是從數位化協同產品設計與開發概念之介紹開始，使學生明白數位化協同產品設計與開發在現代製造業中的重要性，接著介紹理與工作流程管理等相關實務應用觀念。
description.en: Information and network technologies have promoted the traditional concurrent engineering to the next generation. The collaborative e-design and e-development concept has been more popular in industries. This course is introduced from the concept of collaborative product design and development to help students understanding the importance of collaborative e-design and e-development in modern industries. Furthermore, the business model analysis method is provided to construct the collaborative environment of e-design and e-development. In addition, some real cases of data management, configuration management, and workflow management are mentioned.

name.en: Doctoral Seminar on Theories of Multinational Enterprises

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在於讓學生瞭解國際企業的主要研究領域與研究方向，故本課程首先會向同學介紹國際企業研究領域中的主流思維，讓同學瞭解國際企業的性質、型態、發展趨勢與行為模式等。此外，本課程的主要目的，是希望同學能學習到如何將國際企業理論研究的主流思維，結合運用至自己的研究當中。希望博士生於修習本課程後，能夠對於國際企業的領域有更入的瞭解，並能培養出獨立研究的能力。
description.en: This course is designed to introduce students to key areas of research in International Business studies. This course will review the current major theoretical thoughts on the scholar studies of international business, focusing on the nature, patterns, trends, and behavior of transnational corporations.The main objective of this course is then to provide students with an understanding of main currents of thoughts in this area and the abilities in incorporating these thoughts for research in a coherent way. This exercise will aid Ph.D. students in learning about theories of mutinational enterprises, and getting a feel for independent research in IB fields.

notes: 博士班課程,碩士生欲修習須經授課教師同意後方可

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹組織管理的各項重要研究議題，包括人力資源管理、組織行為以及組織理論等。此外，本課程也將介紹諸多有關組織管理研究方法的議題。
description.en: This course introduces many research topics of organizational management, including the topics regarding human resource management (HRM), organizational behavior (OB), and organizational theory (OT). In addition, we will discuss many issues regarding the research methods in organization studies.

notes: 博士班課程,碩士生欲修習須經授課教師同意後方可

description.zh: 本課程旨在讓學生了解整合行銷傳播整體概念，強調行銷傳播工像是廣告、公關、事件活動行銷等等的重要性及運用性，輔以實務個案架構；經由整合行銷個案實例，將整合行銷傳播運用詳加介紹。課堂中經由個案架構互動討論，達成理論與實務並重。
description.en: This course is designed to provide students with knowledge and understanding of the concept of integrated marketing communications and how it can be made to work effectively within an organization. A clear understanding of the principles and practice will develop student ability to analyze the marketing environment and specific marketing problems, create solutions to integrated marketing problems and apply appropriate marketing techniques across a range of market sectors.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。     創新設計之意涵，創新設計之方法，創新設計之個案研究，智慧財產權之維護。
description.en: Meaning of Creative Design, Methods of Creative Design, Case study of Creative Design,      Protection of Intellectual Properties.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹奈米結構材料之合成及其製程技術。內容大綱包括三部分：第一、奈米材料基本物理與化學特性，第二、奈米粉末和薄膜結構材料之化學合成，物理合成製程原理與特性，奈米塊體材料的性能與製備，第三、奈米結構材料應用。
description.en: This course is divided into three sections. The first four chapters deal with those chapters which are the principles of nanostructured Material. The next two chapters describe the engineering options currently available for the synthesis, processing and fabrication of nanostructured materials. The last two chapters deal with different application of nanostructured materials.

description.zh: 本課程主旨在介紹一個企業集團如何創業、擴充事業版圖、多角化經營。企業永續成長與經營的目標，端賴於管理階層具有前瞻性地視野、敏銳的策略規劃、健全的管理制度與人力資源充分有效的發揮。課程進行是以演講的方式介紹該集團各事業體相關之營運情形，讓同學們得以一窺業界實務工作的全貌，以達實務與理論相輔相成的功效。
description.en: The goals of perpetual management and growth of an enterprise are depend upon the top level of vision, lean thinking and strategy planning, organization system integration, and manpower resource effective utilization. The objective of this course is to introduce the practice application and manage a business group.

notes: 四管二.經管所和最後一哩合開,周三ABC上課

name.zh: 國際觀培養-國際商業脈動
name.en: Feast for the global perspective —Global Business Trends

description.zh: 本課程藉由台灣企業與莘莘學子們的交流，分享企業品牌的經營、整合行銷、外銷推廣等經驗之機會，並佐以台灣企業品牌之實際案例，能讓台灣企業與年輕學子能由認識自己所屬國家的奮鬥過程，才能更進一步的追求國際觀，追求更廣闊的國際視野。
description.en: We invite the domestic business manager, as the model of outstanding and successful enterprise, to share his experiences of achievement with students. By offering the real examples, business manager will make students learn further about the Taiwan brand and innovation and creation thinking. Furthermore, to inspire students to pursue their ambition of achievement to strengthen their wills to plan the future.

notes: 四管三.經管所和最後一哩合開,周二ABC上課

description.zh: 本課程在研習數位電視，此課程包含 EDTV HDTV，SDTV。其課程目的在給予學習者了解數位電視分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.影像簡介， 2.顏色空間， 3.類比影像介面， 4.數位影像介面， 5.數位影像處理， 6. NTSC,  PAL, 和 SECAM 系統， 7. H.261 和 H.263， 8. MPEG， 9.數位電視。
description.en: This course is concerned with the digital television (DTV) design, which includes Enhanced Definition Television (EDTV), High Definition Television (HDTV), Standard Definition Television (SDTV). Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of DTV system, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1. Introduction to Video; 2. Color space; 3. Analog video interfaces; 4. Digital Video Interfaces; 5. Digital Video Processing; 6. NTSC, PAL, and SECAM system; 7. H.261 and H.263; 8. MPEG ; 9. Digital Television (DTV).

name.zh: 資通訊產業鳥瞰與挑戰
name.en: Overview and Challenges of ICT Industry

description.zh: 以企業界實務經驗,提供學生對資通訊產業的基本認識,並培養學生在企業內簡報能力,課程包括講師自我介紹,學生分組,課程目的說明, 課程安排說明,資通訊產業環境與基本認知,品質意識與品牌基礎概念,資訊吸收方法與終身學習,學員發表與評分。
description.en: To provide students a general understanding and overview of how ICT industry operates and its challenges before entering job market. The course includes Introduction, ICT industry environment, Quality and brand, Lifelong learning, Final presentation.

name.en: Multimedia Service in Heterogeneous Network Environment

description.zh: 本課程介紹異質多網多媒體的特性與架構，包含：有線及無線網路的內容介紹，以及整合有線及無線網路成為異質網路的概念，其中將針對IEEE 802.21 Media Independent Handover (MIH)教導學生針對異質網路垂直切換的原理及技術。最後，對於多媒體服務技術及原理做介紹，包含：VoIP服務以及視訊串流服務的介紹，以及如何針對 多種異質網路整合多媒體服務的介紹，藉此提升學生對於新世代異質多網多媒體服務之認識。
description.en: This course introduces the characteristics and architecture of multimedia service in heterogeneous network environment. First, wired and wireless networks, e.g., 3G/3.5G/4G, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and other popular wireless access techniques, would be introduced one by one. Then, by describing the theory and technology of IEEE 802.21 Media Independent Handover (MIH), this course would show how to integrate multiple different networks into heterogeneous network environments and how to handoff among them. Finally, regarding multimedia service, VoIP and video streaming services would be taken into consideration. This course would introduce how to provide multimedia services over heterogeneous network environment. Therefore, students can learn the next-generation techniques about multimedia services in heterogeneous network environment from this course.

description.zh: 此門課程的主要目標，將介紹數位多媒體晶片設計，讓學生對於數位多媒體晶片設計有深入的認識與了解，進而產生濃厚的興趣與設計能力。
description.en: This course covers theoretical foundations and applications in digital multimedia IC design. The outline of this course is given as follows. 1. Introduction 2. Digital IC Design3. Color Science4. Multimedia System   a. Image and Video Coding  b. State-of-the-art Image and Video Coding Standards (industry)  c. 3D Video System  d. Holographic System5. Multimedia IC Design Methodology

name.zh: 創新講座--文化生活創意

description.zh: 本課程係提供本校學生與創意界交流的平台，提供學生建立人文藝術相關之涵養，並協助學生體驗文化生活創意之實務過程，透過邀請國內著名之文化生活創意相關之產、官、學界專家進行專題講座，經由專家之經驗分享與傳承，以激發學生透過自身生活之經驗學習創意發展之可能性，開發其創意之潛能。
description.en: Course Description：    This course provide a platform to generate between student and creativity. It could students to build the temperament of human arts, and experience practical process of cultural life creativity. Through the invitation of the cultural life creative expert in production, official, education to have a speech. By the way of sharing and passing down, it could stimulate the learning creative develop possibility of students in their daily life, and develop the potential of creativity.

notes: 四設二三四.創新所和最後一哩合開,一ABC節

description.zh: 本課程介紹現有無線區域網路規格的多工存取層及實體層，並深入解說規格中所使用通訊技術的原理，如載波偵測多工－避免碰撞通訊協定，正交分頻多工調變技術。
description.en: This course contains the medium access control layer(MAC) and physical layer(PHY) of the mose recent IEEE 802.11 standards for wireless local area networks. Thechniques employed by the standards, e.g.,craier sense multiple access/collision avoidance (CSMA/CA),orthogonal frequency-division multiplexing (OFDA), will be discussed in details.

notes: 電通所和電資國際班合開,1鐘點

description.zh: 資料探勘是從大量資料中尋找有用的資訊，是一個跨越統計、資料庫和人工智慧的學門。本課程著重在從資料庫的觀點來看資料探勘的意義，並深入探討幾種資料探勘功能及其技術，最後並以實例討論來驗證資料探勘的應用價值。探討議題包括資料探勘概念、資料探勘功能、資料探勘步驟、資料倉儲、決策樹分析集群分析、關聯分析與購物籃分析等。
description.en: The data mining (DM), which involves in Statistics, Database and Artificial Intelligence fields, prospects to seek Useful information from a great deal of data. This course emphasizes at the view of the database, besides go deeply into several data mining techniques. Finally, the practical case studies will also be discussed. The topic includes the concept of DM, the function of DM, the step of DM, data warehouse, Decision Trees Analysis, Clustering Analysis, Association Rule and Basket Analyzes, etc.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討與各種維生線系統有關的管理技能，諸如公路、通訊、給水管線、電力線、橋樑、瓦斯管線等系統均將加以說明。
description.en: This cause will introduce all kind of management thechniques with infrastructure system, such as highway, communication utility,water supply utility,power utility, bridge and gas utility.

description.zh: 介紹日本設計思維與研究成果，包含日文中設計的相關詞語，藉由導讀與討論設計相關日文期刊雜誌與書籍体驗日本的設計思維。並透過課題演練以達到設計文化交流的積極意義。
description.en: N

description.zh: 此課程將介紹各種實驗之配置法及統計分析方法和結論，包括一因子、二因子、多因子實驗、完全隨機化法、及直交表、田口式品質工程。以提升實驗效率及品質。
description.en: This course aim to provide students with methods of promoting experimental efficiency. It may include introduction to basic statistical concepts, one-factor experiment, two-factor experiment, multi-factor experiments, completely randomized design, randomized and orthogonal array, Taguchi technique for quality engineering.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解策略管理的意義及其演進，如何建立公司策略以增加之競爭力。課程主要內容包括：市場導向、客戶分析與價值創造、競爭者分析與競爭地位、策略執行與績效衡量。
description.en: The objective of the course is to establish a set of frameworks for the formulation and implementation of strategy. Topics are as follows: Market Orientation, Customer Analysis and Value Creation, Competitor Analysis and Competitive Position, Strategy Implementation and Performance Metrics.

description.zh: 本課程教授商品化實務概念並由學生實際操作，如何以一貫作業完成市場銷售商品。由消費者洞察開始，教導學生如何從消費者行為找到需求，進而思考產品設計動機。設計過程中涵蓋專利，製造與營運思維，最後以實際商品設計呈現。
description.en: The purpose of this course is study the concept of commercialization and how to sale the products to marketing through the consistent process.It’ll ask student to find the consumer's requirements from observation, then think and confirm the design purpose. The design process will include patent, manufacture, operating thinking, and commodity design.

notes: 四設四.創新所和最後一哩合開,限10人,有修課限制

name.zh: 高速數位訊號完整設計

description.zh: 1.基礎傳輸線理論2.耦合3.非理想的傳輸線效應4.構裝、連接器與穿接腳5.電源供應系統6.電子電路的模擬
description.en: 1.Ideal Transmission line Fundamentals2.Crosstalk3.Nonideal Interconnect Issues4.Connectors, Packages, and Vias5.Nonideal Return Paths, Simultaneous Switching Noise and Power Delivery6.Electronic Circuits Simulations

description.zh: 軟體在其整個生命週期中要維持「健康」，必須要能確保需求做對(Right)、品質做好(Good)、以及使用上可被依恃 (Dependable)。在軟體工程領域中，軟體生命週期管理(Software Lifecycle Management, SLM)是確保軟體健康的具體作法。本課程將涵蓋軟體昇命週期管理的主要議題、實務作法、與工具，並以案例具體說明。1	軟體的生命週期2	軟體生命週期管理的挑戰3	軟體生命週期管理實務作法4	軟體生命週期管理平台與工具5	軟體生命週期管理案例
description.en: To ensure that software stays healthy through its lifetime, the development team must work to guarantee that the requirements are correctly implemented, that software quality is good, and that the software product is dependable in its use. Software lifecycle management seeks to bring forward such guarantees. In this course, the main issues, challenges, best practices, tool supports, and some illuminating case studies are covered.1	Software lifecycle management2	Challenges of software lifecycle management3	Best practices for software lifecycle management4	Platforms and tool supports for software lifecycle           management5	Case studies

name.zh: 空間設計形式構成研究

description.zh: 從文化與歷史的觀點，看空間形式生成的歷程；從前人創作的結果，探究形式設計的創新門徑。本課程以人類生活空間包含器物、室內空間、建築外部、公共景觀設施等所呈現的各種形式構成為研究目標，回溯既往，以為創新。
description.en: To learn from the past, to build innovative creation on historical heritage, the course analyses aesthetic components from existing masterpieces in order to inspire ideas for innovative design work. Case studies are guided to investigate on 'form' appeared in our surrounding including interior space, furniture, architecture, infrastructure and landscape.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計類比濾波器,進而能培養學生具有設計類比濾波器的能力,課程內容包念： 1.簡介 2.低雜訊放大器 3.混波器 4.振盪器5.頻率合成器 6.功率放大器 7. 類比基頻訊號處理
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of analog filter. Therefore, the student has the design capability of analog filter integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1. Introduction 2.LNA 3.Mixer 4.Oscillators 5.Frequency Synthesizers 6.Power Amplifier 7.Analog Baseband Signal Processing

description.zh: 本課程為一門加強思考能力的工具課。藉由探索如何思考的過程，體會到同理心的在創作與創新過程中的重要。其最終目標為培養學生與未來社會接軌與形塑的能力與成為未來所需要的人才做準備。從實際體驗的課程中，學員可以了解設計思考的歷程，並將Design Thinkning 活用在生活的基礎。配合國內外成功典範研究，以強化同理心與培養洞見的習慣。課程的特色著重跨領域知識方法論的互補與異同之討論，並以人文科學的方法為以人為本的設計奠定基礎，進而使學生能將創作超越媒材熟練度，涵蓋了以地方經驗所淬煉出來的普世價值。
description.en: If you would like to develop your thinking skills, this is the course for you. By exploring the process of thinking, it becomes clear that empathy plays a vital in the process of creativity and innovation. The ultimate goal for this course is for the students to become the future talent needs to prepare.  With the successful example The characteristics of the course focuses on interdisciplinary knowledge, complementary methodology and discussion of the similarities and differences, for a human-centered design, and thus make the students capable of applying their creativity beyond the form proficiency.

class.name: 永續建築外國學生專班

description.zh: 1.標準與追溯 2.尺度學 3.承載台設計 4.驅動器之使用與設計 5.基台與框架設計6.探頭設計 7.材料選用 8.溫控與防振措施 9.雜訊處理 10.對稱方法使用11.定位精度探討 12.光機電系統於半導體設備之應用13.光機電系統於光電設備之應用
description.en: Structure of mechatronic systems, mechanism of mechatronic systems, sensors, probe design, temperature control and anti-vibration measures, symmetry method uses, drivers and actuators, interface techniques, discussion on the positioning accuracy, application of physics of semiconductor device and case study.

description.zh: This course introduces students to central thematic and cultural ideas in the major texts of the early modern period, from Chaucer to Shakespeare and Milton.  Read closely by the major writers of later periods, these works are the foundation of modern English literature and western thought.  They also provide essential background knowledge for any graduate study of western culture, literature, or history of ideas.
description.en: 本課程將學生帶入早期現代的重要文學作家（如喬叟、莎士比亞、彌爾頓）作品中的文化思想與理念主題。多年來，這些作家的作品不斷地被後世的重要思想家詮釋、引用，進而建立了現代英語文學與西方思想的基礎。他們的作品亦提供學生研究西方文化、文學、及思想歷史的必要知識。

description.zh: 基本分析：1.產業分析基本概念2.常用財務比率3.ROE財務樹狀分析；產業競爭環境框架分析：1.價值鏈分析2.靜態分析3.動態分析；產業競爭分析：1.供需分析2.生命週期3.KPI and SWOT；企業內部分析：1.組織分析2.成本結構分析與學習曲線；特殊議題：1.網絡效應2.產業群聚3.產業創新與創新產業4.社會企業；產業整合分析I-基礎篇: 競爭環境分析整合與知識融合；產業整體分析II-從產業分析走向策略規劃；產業整體分析III-從產業分析走向企業管理與投資評估；產業整體分析IV-產業創新與風險分析。
description.en: Basic analysis：1. Fundamental concept 2. Financial ratio analysis 3. ROE financial analysis；Competition framework analysis：1. Value chain analysis 2. Static analysis 3. Dynamic analysis；Industrial competitive analysis：1. Supply-demand analysis 2. lifecycle S curve 3. KPI and SWOT；Internal assessment：1. Organization analysis 2. Cost curve and learning curve；Special topics：1. Network impact 2. Cluster effect 3. Industrial innovation and star-up enterprises 4. Social enterprise；Integrated Industrial Analysis I: competitive analysis and knowledge fusion.；Integrated Industrial Analysis II: from analysis to strategic planning；Integrated Industrial Analysis III: from analysis to corporate management and investment valuation；Integrated Industrial Analysis IV: business innovation and risk analysis.

description.zh: 1.X 光繞射方法 2.熱分析法 3.電子顥微鏡 4.核磁共振分析 5.孔隙學研究 6.Atomic Bonding 7.The Architecture of Solids8.Development of Microstructure 9.Surface Properties 10.Particulate Composites 11.Steel 12.Polymer and Plastics 13.Asphalt Cement and Asphalt Concrete 14.Fiber-Reinforced Composites.

class.name: 土木環境外國學生專班

name.zh: 科技政策與國家競爭力
name.en: Science and Technology Policy and National Competitiveness

description.zh: 本專題研究為對針對相關的產業政策理論及國內外經驗研究，以政治經濟學的視野回顧、解讀及展望科技產業政策的作為，特別是我國的經驗。在面臨世界經濟快速變遷下，過去的經驗給予我們什麼啟示？我國政府在制定產業政策上正面臨什麼挑戰？政府在現在與未來應如何因應調整相關政策？
description.en: This course is to introduce related theories of industrial policy and practice, and review and foresee technology policies in Taiwan and other countries through political economics. Related issues are: What inspirations do we have from past practice? What challenges does our government face when making technology policies? How can the government make appropriate technology policies for now and in the future? Etc.

description.zh: 本課程以智財法律的相關個案討論為中心，讓同學有機會嘗試運用所學、解決實際的法律問題。適合對智財法律已有基礎認識、或有相當興趣之同學，以期同學能夠透過本實習課程，進一步了解法律於現實中可能面臨的問題、並練習提供解決策略。
description.en: This course will focus on the case study of intellectual property laws. Students will have opportunities to further understand the legal practice in IP area by taking part in solving real cases with the help of the course tutor. It is recommended for those who are equipped with a general understanding of IP laws or are strongly interested in this subject.
